AcceptTermsAndConditionsScreen.text: Ngokucofa 'Yamkela', uyavumelana neMigaqo neMiqathango yethu. Kananjalo uyavuma ukuba awuhlali okanye awulilo isizalwane samazwe avalelweyo.

PeopleScreen.noContactsYet: Thumela okanye ufumane intlawulo usebenzisa igama lomsebenzisi kwaye abaqhagamshelwano baya kongezwa apha ngokuzenzekelayo
PeopleScreen.noMatchingContacts: Akukho qhagamshelwano zihambelana nokukhangela kwakho ezifunyenweyo.

ConversionConfirmationScreen.infoBitcoin: Isixa se-Bitcoin siqikelelo kuphela. Singatshintsha ngesixa esincinci.
ConversionConfirmationScreen.infoDollar: Isixa seDola siqikelelo kuphela. Singatshintsha ngesixa esincinci.

whatIsBitcoin.question: Yintoni kanye kanye iBitcoin?
whatIsBitcoin.text:
I-Bitcoin yimali yedijithali.

 Inokuthi idluliselwe ngokukhawuleza kwaye ikhuselekile phakathi kwanabaphi na abantu ababini emhlabeni - ngaphandle kwesidingo sebhanki okanye nayiphi na enye inkampani yemali phakathi.
whatIsBitcoin.title: Yintoni kanye iBitcoin?
feedback: Siyavuyisana nawe. Usanda kufumana ‚Äúisethi‚Äù enye -1!
Ayivumi, nceda uzame kwakhona
Hayi. Asinalo noluncane ulwazi

sat.question: Ndisanda kufumana "Sat". Yintoni iSat?
sat.text:
"iSat"enye yiyunithi encinci ye-bitcoin. Sonke siyazi ukuba iDola enye yase-US inokohlulwa ibe yi-100 yeesenti. Ngokufanayo, i-Bitcoin enye inokwahlulwa ibe yi-100,000,000 sats.

 Ngapha koko, awudingi ukuba ne-bitcoin enye epheleleyo ukuze uyisebenzise. Ungasebenzisa i-bitcoin nokuba unayo i-20 sats, i-3000 sats - okanye i-100,000,000 sats (oyaziyo ngoku ilingana ne-bitcoin enye).
sat.title: Ndisanda kufumana "Sat". Yintoni iSat?
feedback: Sivuyisana nawe. Ufumene ezinye ezimbini!
Mhlawumbi‚Ä¶ kodwa ayisiyiyo impendulo echanekileyo kulo mongoüôÇ
Ummm....akunjalo!

whereBitcoinExist.question: Zifumaneka phi bitcoin?
whereBitcoinExist.text:
I-Bitcoin yindlela entsha yemali. Inokusetyenziswa nguye nabani na, nanini na -- naphi na emhlabeni.

Ayibotshelelwanga kurhulumente okanye ummandla othile (njengeedola zase-US). Kananjalo akukho matyala ephepha, iingqekembe zentsimbi okanye amakhadi eplastiki. Yonke into i-100% yedijithali. I-Bitcoin yinethiwekhi yeekhompyuter ezisebenza kwi-intanethi.

 I-bitcoin yakho ilawulwa ngokulula ngesoftware kwi-smartphone okanye kwikhompyuter yakho!
whereBitcoinExist.title: Zifumaneka phi bitcoin?
feedback: Siyavuyisan nawe. Usanda kufumana ezinye iiseti ezi-5
Incorrect. Well‚Ä¶ at least not yet ;)
Ayivumi. Nceda uzame kwakhona

whoControlsBitcoin.question: Ngubani olawula iBitcoin?
whoControlsBitcoin.text: I-Bitcoin ayilawulwa nguye nawuphi na umntu, inkampani okanye urhulumente. Iqhutywa luluntu oluyisebenzisayo kunye neenkampani kwihlabathi liphela ngokuzinikela,  ziqhuba isoftware ye-bitcoin kwiikhompyuter zabo kunye nee-smartphones.
whoControlsBitcoin.title: Ngubani olawula iBitcoin?
feedback: Liyinyani eloba I-Bitcoin yenziwa ukuba ibekho ngabantu kwihlabathi liphela besebenzisa isoftware ye-bitcoin kwiikhompyuter zabo kunye nee-smartphones.
Ingcinga ehlekisayo - kodwa ayilunganga!
Asivumelani. Akukho nkampani okanye urhulumente olawula i-Bitcoin.

copyBitcoin.question: Ukuba iBitcoin yimali yedijithali, ngaba umntu akanakuyikopisha nje - kwaye enze imali yasimahla?
copyBitcoin.text:
Ixabiso le-bitcoin alinakuze likhutshelwe. Esi sesona sizathu sibangela ukuba i-Bitcoin ibe yinto entsha enamandla kangaka!! 

Uninzi lweefayile zedijithali - ezinje ngefoto ye-iPhone, ingoma yeMP3, okanye uxwebhu lweMicrosoft Word - zinokuphinda-phinda kwaye kwabelwane ngazo. 

Isoftware yeBitcoin inqanda ngokukodwa ukuphinda-okanye "inkcitho kabini" - yemali yedijithali. Siza kwabelana ngokuthe ngqo ukuba oku kusebenza njani kamva!
copyBitcoin.title: Ukuba iBitcoin yimali yedijithali, ngaba umntu akanakuyikopisha nje - kwaye enze imali yasimahla?
answers: Akukwazeki ukukopisha okanye ukuphinda - phinda ixabiso le-bitcoin
Ewe, unokukopa iibitcoins ngokulula kanjengokuba ukwazi ukopa ifoto yedijithali
Ewe, kodwa ukukopa i-bitcoin kufuna iikhompyuter ezikhethekileyo
feedback: Sivumelana nawe kakhulu!
Asiyonyaniso. Zama kwakhona
Akuvumelekanga. Akukho ndlela yokuba nabani na akope, okanye enze ikopi, ye-bitcoin.

answers.0: Kuba abantu bathemba ukuba abanye abantu baya kuyixabisa imali ngokufanayo
answers.2: Kuba iphepha ledola lixabisa ubunzima balo ngegolide

feedback.0: Kuchanekile. Yiyo le nto ivumela imali isebenze!
feedback.1: Mhlawumbi utsho. Kodwa leyo ayiyompendulo echanekileyo apha!
feedback.2: Hayi. Kwixesha elidlulileyo ubunokutshintsha iidola zaseMelika ngegolide. Kodwa oku akusenjalo.

moneySocialAgreement.question: Kutheni imali inexabiso?
moneySocialAgreement.text:
Imali ifuna abantu bathembe.

Abantu bathemba amaphepha edola ezipokothweni zabo. Bathemba amanani kwiakhawunti yabo yebhanki ye-intanethi. Bathemba ukuba ibhalansi yekhadi lesipho sevenkile iya kuhlawuleka.

Ukuba nemali kuvumela abantu ukuba bayirhwebeshane ngokukhawuleza ngempahla, okanye inkonzo.
moneySocialAgreement.title: Imali sisivumelwano sentlalo.

coincidenceOfWants.question: Yeyiphi into eyenzekayo xa imali isombulula?
coincidenceOfWants.text:
Kwiinkulungwane ezadlulayo, ngaphambi kokuba abantu babe nemali, babetshintshiselana--okanye baxoxisane ngendlela yokurhweba ngento eyodwa eyodwa, ukutshintshiselana kwenye into okanye inkonzo.

 Masithi ubufuna ukutya kwindawo yokutyela yendawo, kwaye unike umniniyo umtshayelo. Umnini usenokuthi ‚Äúhayi‚Äù -- kodwa ndiya kwamkela iminqwazi emithathu endaweni yoko, ukuba kuyenzeka ukuba unayo.

 Unokucinga ukuba kuya kuba nzima kwaye kungasebenzi kakuhle kangakanani "uqoqosho lwamashishini"!

 Ngokwahlukileyo, ngemali, unokubonisa ngokulula ibhilikhwe yeedola ezingama-20. Kwaye uyazi ukuba umnini wevenkile yokutyela uya kuyamkela ngokukhawuleza.
coincidenceOfWants.title: Imali isombulula "ukuhambelana kweemfuno"... Yintoni leyo?
feedback: Lonto ilungile. Imali ikuvumela ukuba uthenge into ngokulula, ngaphandle kokungcungcuthekisa malunga nendlela yokuhlawula
Hayi sisidenge, uyazi ukuba ayiyompendulo leyo.
Akunjalo. Oko sikubiza ngokusithwa kwelanga yinyanga üåö

moneyEvolution.question: Zeziphi ezinye izinto ebezisetyenziswa ngokwembali njengeyunithi yemali?
moneyEvolution.text:
Kumawaka eminyaka eyadlulayo, uluntu lwaseMicronesia lwalusebenzisa amatye amakhulu kakhulu nanqabileyo njengendlela yemali ekuvunyelwene ngayo.

 Ukususela ngeminyaka yee-1500, amaqokobhe eCowrie anqabileyo (awafunyanwa elwandle) ayesetyenziswa kumazwe amaninzi njengohlobo lwemali.

 Kwaye kangangamawaka eminyaka, igolide ibisetyenziswa njengohlobo lwemali kumazwe ehlabathi jikelele-- kubandakanywa ne-United States (de kube ngo-1971).
moneyEvolution.title: Imali iye yavela, ukususela ekuqaleni kwexesha
feedback: Kulungile. Izinto ezinqabileyo nekunzima ukuzikhuphela ngokufuthi bezisetyenziswa njengemali.
Ayilunganga. Banokuba nexabiso xa bedlala umdlalo -- kodwa hayi kwigama lokwenyani
Hayi. Zisenokuba mnandi. Kodwa aziloncedo njengemali.

whyStonesShellGold.question: Kwakutheni ukuze kusetyenziswe amatye, oonokrwece baselwandle kunye negolide njengeeyunithi zemali?
whyStonesShellGold.text:
Ewe, ezi zinto zonke zinezinye-kodwa hayi zonke--yeempawu zemali elungileyo. 

Ngoko ke zeziphi iimpawu ezenza imali ‚Äúelungileyo‚Äù? Ukunqongophala: akukho maninzi, kwaye akukho lula ukuyivelisa okanye ukuyikhuphela Yamkelwe: kulula ukuba abantu baqinisekise ubunyani bayo Yomelele: kulula ukuyigcina, kwaye ayitshabalali okanye iwahlukane Iyunifomu: itshintsheka lula nenye into ekwimo efanayo Ephathekayo:

 kulula ukuthutha Yahlukana: inokwahlulwa kwaye kwabelwane ngayo ngamaqhekeza amancinci
whyStonesShellGold.title: Kutheni le nto amatye, amaqokobhe kunye negolide zazisetyenziswa njengemali ngaphambili?
answers: Ngenxa yokuba zineempawu eziphambili--ezifana nokuqina, ukufana kunye nokwahlulwa.
feedback: Kulungile. Iimpawu eziphambili ezingakumbi ziquka ukunqongophala kunye nokuphatheka.
Ayilunganga. Oko kusenokuba yinyaniso, kodwa iyodwa ayizizo iimpawu ezintle zemali.
Akunjalo. Nangona ezi zinto zaziphathwa ngokuqinisekileyo, oko kuphela kwakungesosizathu sokusetyenziswa njengemali.

moneyIsImportant.question: Sesiphi esona sizathu siphambili sokuba imali ibaluleke?
moneyIsImportant.text:
Wonke umntu uyazi ukuba imali ibalulekile.

 Uninzi lwabantu lutshintshisa ixesha namandla abo -- ngomsebenzi -- ukuze bafumane imali. Abantu benza njalo, ukuze bakwazi ukuthenga iimpahla kunye neenkonzo namhlanje - nakwixesha elizayo.
moneyIsImportant.title: Imali ibalulekile kumntu ngamnye
answers: Imali ivumela abantu ukuba bathenge iimpahla kunye neenkonzo namhlanje -- nangomso.
feedback: Lonto ilungile!
Ayilunganga. Nangona oko kunokutshintsha kwixesha elizayo;)
Akunjalo. Nangona abanye abantu besenokukukholelwa oko, le mpendulo ayibhekiseli kwinjongo ephambili yemali.

moneyImportantGovernement.question: Ngubani onokuprinta ngokusemthethweni iiDola zaseMelika, nangaliphi na ixesha abanqwenela ngalo?
moneyImportantGovernement.text: Uqoqosho lwale mihla luququzelelwa ngamazwe-lizwe: i-USA, iJapan, iSwitzerland, iBrazil, iNorway, iChina, njl. Ngokufanelekileyo, kwinkoliso yezizwe zonke, urhulumente unegunya lokukhupha nokulawula imali. EUnited States, iBhanki Ephakathi (eyaziwa ngokuba yi-Federal Reserve, okanye "i-Fed") ingaprinta, okanye idale, iidola zase-US ezininzi nangaliphi na ixesha elifunayo. "I-Fed" ayifuni mvume kuMongameli, okanye iCongress, kwaye ngokuqinisekileyo ayiveli kubemi base-US. Khawufane ucinge ukuba ubunakho ukuprinta iiDola zaseMelika nangaliphi na ixesha ufuna uku-- ungenza ntoni?
moneyImportantGovernement.title: Imali ikwabalulekile koorhulumente
answers: Umfana onomatshini wokushicilela kwigumbi lakhe elingaphantsi
feedback: Kulungile. Urhulumente wase-US unokuprinta imali eninzi njengoko efuna nangaliphi na ixesha.
Ayilunganga. Nangona kwakubonakala ngathi wayesoloko enemali eninzi.
Hayi. Ngelixa abanye abantu besenza iidola zomgunyathi, ngokuqinisekileyo akukho mthethweni!

answers: Kuba abantu banethemba lokuba nabanye abantu baya kuyixabisa ngendlela efanayo imali
Ngokuba kaloku umama wakho ukuxelele njalo
Ngokuba idolla ixabiso layo lifana nelegolide
feedback: Kulungile. Oku kukuvumela ukuba imali isebenze
Kusenokwenzeka ukuba unayo. Kodwa ayiyompendulo ichanekileyo leyo apha!
Hayi. Ngaphambili ubunokutshintshisa ngeedola zaseMelika ngegolide. Kodwa oku akusekho
moneySocialAggrement.question: Kutheni imali inexabiso?
moneySocialAggrement.text:
Imali ifuna abantu bathembane.

Abantu bayawathemba amaphepha edola epokothweni. Bazithemba iidijithi kwiakhawunti yabo yebhanki ekwi-intanethi. Bathemba ibhalansi kwikhadi lesipho sevenkile liya kuhlawuleka. Ukuba nemali kuvumela abantu ukuba bayirhwebe ngokulula ngokukhawuleza ukuze bafumane okulungileyo, okanye inkonzo.
moneySocialAggrement.title: Imali sisivumelwano soluntu.

WhatIsFiat.question: Ngubani owenza imali ye-fiat, efana ne-US Dollars okanye i-Swiss Francs?
WhatIsFiat.text:
Zonke iimali zelizwe ezijikelezayo namhlanje zibizwa ngokuba yimali "ye-fiat". Oku kuquka iiDola zaseMelika, iYen yaseJapan, iifranc zaseSwitzerland, njalo njalo.

 Igama elithi "fiat" ngesiLatini lithetha "ngommiselo" -- elithetha "ngomyalelo osemthethweni". Oku kuthetha ukuba yonke imali ye-fiat -- kuquka iDola yase-US -- yenziwa ngokulula ngumyalelo worhulumente wesizwe.
WhatIsFiat.title: Fiat Currency: Yintoni leyo?
answers: Idalwe ngomyalelo worhulumente weSizwe kwilizwe elinikiweyo.
feedback: Kulungile. Ibhanki ephakathi karhulumente yenza imali yefiat.
Ayilunganga. Ibhanki yendawo inokulawula kuphela imali eyenziwe ngurhulumente ngaphambili.
Hayi. Zama kwakhona!

whyCareAboutFiatMoney.question: Kutheni kufuneka ndikhathalele urhulumente olawula imali ye-fiat?
whyCareAboutFiatMoney.text:
Njengoko kwabelwane ngemibuzo yangaphambili, iBhanki yase-US yiFederal Reserve, okanye ‚ÄúiFed‚Äù.

 I-Fed inokushicilela iidola ezininzi nangaliphi na ixesha- kwaye ayifuni mvume kuMongameli, okanye iCongress, kwaye ngokuqinisekileyo ayiveli kubemi baseMelika.

 Ukulawula imali kunokuhenda kakhulu ukuba abasemagunyeni basebenzise kakubi - kwaye amaxesha amaninzi kukhokelela ekunyukeni okukhulu kwamaxabiso, ukuthinjwa ngokungekho semthethweni kunye norhwaphilizo. 

Ngapha koko, u-Alan Greenspan, owayesakuba ngusihlalo odumileyo we-Fed, ngokudumileyo wathi i-US "inokuhlawula naliphi na ityala elinalo, kuba sinokuhlala siprinta ngakumbi ukwenza oko".
whyCareAboutFiatMoney.title: Ndiyamthemba urhulumente wam. Kutheni kufuneka ndiyikhathalele imali ye-fiat?
answers: Yonke imali ye-fiat ekugqibeleni isetyenziswa kakubi ngabasemagunyeni bakarhulumente.
Iibhanki zasekuhlaleni zisenokungabi nandawo yaneleyo yokugcina idola
Kusenokungabikho imithi eyaneleyo yokwenza iphepha kuzo zonke iibhili zeedola ezongezelelweyo.
feedback: Kulungile. Mandulo, oorhulumente bebengakwazi ukuxhathisa ukukwazi ukushicilela imali, njengoko bengenasinyanzelo sokubuyisela le mali.
Hayi, ngokuqinisekileyo akunjalo.
Ayivumi. Nceda uzame kwakhona

GovernementCanPrintMoney.question: Kuthetha ukuthini xa urhulumente eprinta imali?
GovernementCanPrintMoney.text:
Ewe, wonke umntu makakhathalele!

 Ukwenziwa koshicilelo lwemali karhulumente -- okanye ukonyusa unikezelo lweedola -- kukhokelela ekwenyukeni kwamaxabiso. 

Ukunyuka kwamaxabiso kukukhula kwexabiso lempahla neenkonzo. Ngamanye amazwi, ixabiso lento kwixesha elizayo liya kuba libiza kakhulu kunanamhlanje. 

Ngoko kuthetha ntoni ukunyuka kwamaxabiso kubemi? EUnited Kingdom, iPound Sterling ilahlekelwe yi-99.5% yexabiso layo ukusukela oko yaziswa kwiminyaka engama-300 eyadlulayo. 

EUnited States, idola ilahlekelwe yi-97% yexabiso layo ukususela ekupheleni kweWWI, malunga neminyaka eyi-100 edlulileyo. Oku kuthetha inyama yenyama eyayixabisa i-$0.30 ngo-1920... yayiyi-3 yeedola ngo-1990‚Ä¶ kwaye malunga ne-15 yeedola namhlanje, ngonyaka ka-2020!
GovernementCanPrintMoney.title: Ngubani omele akhathalele ukuba urhulumente angaprinta imali engenamkhawulo?
answers: Ukushicilelwa kwemali eyongezelelweyo kukhokelela ekunyukeni kwamaxabiso.
Abantu kufuneka batshintshe iidola endala ebhankini rhoqo ngonyaka.
feedback: Liyinyani. Elokuba  iimpahla kunye neenkonzo ziya kuxabisa ngaphezulu kwixesha elizayo.
Hayi. Idola endala isebenza kanye njengamatsha.
Ayilunganga. Nangona urhulumente enokuthi akhuphe imbonakalo emitsha yeebhili, oku akunanto yakwenza nokwandisa imali.

FiatLosesValueOverTime.question: Kwenzeka ntoni kwixabiso layo yonke imali ye-fiat ukuhambeni kwexesha?
FiatLosesValueOverTime.text:
Kwimbali yehlabathi, kuye kwadalwa iimali ze-775 ze-fiat. Uninzi alusekho, kwaye ubomi obuqhelekileyo bayo nayiphi na imali ye-fiat yiminyaka engama-27 kuphela.

 IPonti yaseBritane yeyona mali indala yefiat. Ilahlekelwe ngaphezulu kwe-99% yexabiso layo ukusukela ngo-1694.

 Akukho mzekelo kuyo nayiphi na imali ye-fiat egcina ixabiso layo ngokuhamba kwexesha. Oku kukunyuka kwamaxabiso. Luhlobo olusebenzayo lobusela lwemali oyisebenze nzima!
FiatLosesValueOverTime.title: Ngaba oku kuthetha ukuba yonke imali ye-fiat ilahlekelwa lixabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha?
answers: Yonke imali eyakha yabakho ilahlekelwe sisixa esikhulu sexabiso.
Inkangeleko kunye ne-designer yephepha yebhili luhlaziywa rhoqo emva kweminyaka eyi-10 okanye njalo.
feedback: Kulungile. Oku kuyinyaniso nakwi-USD, elahlekelwe yi-97% yexabiso layo kwiminyaka eyi-100 esiyidlulileyo.
Ayiyo. Nceda zame kwakhona.
Akunjalo. Nangona i-designer yamaphepha eebhili zingatshintsha, oku akunanto yakwenza nexabiso labo.

OtherIssues.question: Yeyiphi eminye imiba ekhoyo ngemali yefiat?
OtherIssues.text: Ewe, mininzi eminye imiba ekhoyo ngemali yefiat yanamhlanje. Okokuqala, kunokuba nzima kakhulu ukuhambisa imali kwihlabathi jikelele. Rhoqo, oorhulumente baya kuyibekela imida intshukumo -- kwaye ngamanye amaxesha bade bathathe imali -- ngaphandle kwesizathu esibambekayo okanye ingcaciso. Kwaye nokuba unokuthumela imali, imirhumo ephezulu yentengiselwano iyenza ibize kakhulu. Okwesibini, nase-US, kubekho ilahleko epheleleyo yobungasese, njengoko uninzi lorhwebo luthatha indawo ngedebhithi namakhadi okuthenga ngetyala, kunye ne-intanethi nezinye iinkqubo ezifana nePayPal kunye neApple Pay. Ngaba ukhe wayiqaphela indlela intengiso ebonakala ngayo kwimidiya yakho yentlalo okanye iGmail kwimizuzwana nje emva kokukhangela imveliso okanye inkonzo ethile? Oku kwaziwa ngokuba yi-‚Äúsurveillance capitalism‚Äù, kwaye isekwe kwiinkampani ezithengisa iinkcukacha zakho zemali.
OtherIssues.title: Kulungile, imali ye-fiat ilahlekelwa yixabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha. Ngaba ikhona eminye imiba?
answers: Imali inzima ukuhamba kwihlabathi jikelele, kwaye inokujongwa.
feedback: Kulungile. Siza kucacisa ngakumbi ngale miba kwiimodyuli zemibuzo elandelayo. Qhubeka ugrumba!!
Impendulo engalunganga. Uyazi ukuba asiyonyani leyo.
Ngelixa abanye benokukholelwa ukuba oku kunjalo, akuyompendulo esiyifunayo apha.

LimitedSupply.question: Ngaba unikezelo lwe-bitcoin lulinganiselwe ngonaphakade?
LimitedSupply.text: Oorhulumente banokuprinta imali ye-fiat ngobuninzi obungenamkhawulo. Ngokwahlukileyo, ukunikezelwa kweBitcoin kulungisiwe - kwaye akunakuze kudlule i-21 yezigidi zemali. Ubonelelo oluqhubekayo lwemali ye-fiat ludala ukunyuka kwamaxabiso. Oku kuthetha ukuba imali onayo namhlanje ayinaxabiso elincinci kwixesha elizayo. Umzekelo omnye olula: Ilofu yesonka eyayixabisa malunga neesenti ezisi-8 ngowe-1920. Ngonyaka we-1990 ilofu enye yayixabisa malunga nee-R1,00, yaye namhlanje ixabiso layo lisondele kwi-R2,50! Ukunikezelwa okulinganiselwe kwe-bitcoin kunempembelelo echaseneyo, enye ye-deflation. Oku kuthetha ukuba i-bitcoin oyibambe namhlanje yenzelwe ukuba yexabiso ngakumbi kwixesha elizayo - kuba inqabile.
LimitedSupply.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #1: Umda we - saplaya
answers: Ewe. Akunakuze kubekho ngaphezu kwe-21 yezigidi ze-bitcoin ezenziweyo.
Hayi. Urhulumente unokudala i-bitcoin engaphezulu nangaliphi na ixesha.
Hayi, isoftware ye-bitcoin inokutshintshwa ukuvumela ukuba kwenziwe ii-bitcoins ezininzi.
feedback: Kulungile. Ngokunciphisa inani elinokwenziwa, i-Bitcoin yenzelwe ukwandisa ixabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha.
Impendulo engalunganga. Urhulumente akanalo ulawulo kwi-Bitcoin.
Ayilunganga. Enye yeempawu eziphambili ze-bitcoin kukuba unikezelo lulinganiselwe ngonaphakade.

Decentralized.question: Ngaba i-bitcoin iphakathi?
Decentralized.text: Imali yeFiat ilawulwa ziibhanki noorhulumente - yiyo loo nto abantu beyibiza njengemali "ephakathi". I-Bitcoin ayilawulwa nguye nawuphi na umntu, urhulumente okanye inkampani ‚Äî nto leyo eyenza ukuba ‚Äúinatyisiwe‚Äù Ukungabandakanyekanga kweebhanki kuthetha ukuba akukho mntu unokukwala ukuba ufikelele kwi-bitcoin - ngenxa yobuhlanga, isini, umvuzo, imbali yetyala, indawo yejografi - okanye nayiphi na enye into. Nabani na - naphi na emhlabeni - unokufikelela kwaye asebenzise iBitcoin nanini na ufuna. Ekuphela kwento oyifunayo yikhompyuter okanye i-smartphone, kunye noqhagamshelo lwe-intanethi!
Decentralized.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #2: Ukwabela amagunya
answers: Ewe. Ilawulwa embindini ziibhanki ezinkulu zehlabathi.
feedback: Ichanile loo nto. Akukho nkampani, urhulumente okanye iziko elilawula i-bitcoin. Nabani na unokusebenzisa i-bitcoin into efunekayo si-smartphone kunye noqhagamshelo lwe-intanethi.
Ayompendulo ifanelekileyo. Nceda zama kwakhona.
Ayilunganga. Sele uyazi ukuba oku akuyonyani!

NoCounterfeitMoney.question: Ngaba abantu bangayenza iBitcoin yomgunyathi?
NoCounterfeitMoney.text: Imali yamaphepha, iitshekhi kunye nentengiselwano yekhadi lokuthenga ngetyala zonke zinokuba zezomgunyathi, okanye zomgunyathi. Isoftware ekhethekileyo eqhuba inethiwekhi yeBitcoin isusa ithuba lokuphinda imali ngeenjongo zomgunyathi. I-bitcoin entsha inokukhutshwa kuphela ukuba kukho isivumelwano phakathi kwabathathi-nxaxheba kwinethiwekhi. Abantu abasebenzisa isoftware ye-bitcoin ngokuzithandela kwiikhompyuter zabo kunye nee-smartphones. Oku kuqinisekisa ukuba akunakwenzeka ukwenza umgunyathi, okanye ukudala i-bitcoins yobuxoki.
NoCounterfeitMoney.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #3: Akukho Mali Yenkohliso
answers: Ewe. Nangona ukwenza i-bitcoin yobuxoki kufuna iikhompyuter ezikhethekileyo.
Ewe. Urhulumente unokuprinta i-bitcoin eninzi njengoko ethanda.
feedback: Leyo yimpendulo echanekileyo. Kwimibuzo elandelayo, uHoney Badger uya kucacisa iinkcukacha zokuba kutheni oku kunjalo!
Ayilunganga. Akukho ndlela yokuba nabani na akhuphele okanye aphindaphinde ixabiso le-bitcoin.
Ayilunganga. Nangona urhulumente enokushicilela iidola ezingenamkhawulo, akakwazi ukuprinta i-bitcoin.

HighlyDivisible.question: Yeyiphi eyona mali incinci yeBitcoin umntu anokuba nayo, okanye ayisebenzise?
HighlyDivisible.text: Imali yefiat yakudala inokuchithwa kuphela ngokwemali encinci njengepeni enye - okanye iindawo ezimbini zedesimali kwiDola enye yaseMelika ($0.01). Ngakolunye uhlangothi, i-Bitcoin inokwahlulwa ngamaxesha angama-100,000,000 ngaphezulu. Oku kuthetha ukuba ungachitha kancinci njenge ‚Çø0.00000001. Uya kuqaphela uphawu "‚Çø", olulingana neBitcoin "$". Ngamanye amaxesha uya kubona nokusetyenziswa kwe-BTC, endaweni ye-‚Çø. Ngokwahlukileyo, i-Bitcoin inokuphatha iintlawulo ezincinci kakhulu - nezo zingaphantsi kwe penny yase-US!
HighlyDivisible.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #4: Yahlukana kakhulu
answers: I-bitcoin enye epheleleyo. Akunakwenzeka ukusebenzisa nantoni na encinci.
feedback: Ewe. Unokwahlula i-bitcoin kwiinqununu ze-100,000,000. Njengoko sele uyazi, iyunithi encinci ye-bitcoin - B0.00000001 - iyaziwa ngokuba "iSeti‚Äù.
Ayilunganga. I-Bitcoin yahlukana kakhulu. Ungasebenzisa ngokulula iqhezu elincinci le-bitcoin.
Ayilunganga. Nangona eyona yunithi incinci yemali yase-US iyipeni enye, i-bitcoin yahlulahlula ngaphezu kwe-100x.

securePartOne.question: Ngaba inethiwekhi yeBitcoin ikhuselekile?
securePartOne.text: Inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ixabisa ngaphezulu kwe-100 yeebhiliyoni zeedola namhlanje. Ngokufanelekileyo, inethiwekhi kufuneka ikhuseleke kakhulu - ukuze imali ingaze ibiwe. I-Bitcoin yaziwa ngokuba yi-cryptocurrency yokuqala yehlabathi. Inxalenye ye "crypto" yegama ivela kwi-cryptography. Ngamafutshane, i-cryptography ikhusela ulwazi ngemisebenzi yezibalo enzima kakhulu. Uninzi lwabantu aluqondi - kodwa i-Bitcoin ngenene yeyona nethiwekhi yekhompyuter ikhuselekile emhlabeni! (usenokuba ukhe weva nge-bitcoin "hacks" - esiza kuyiphendula kwimibuzo elandelayo)
securePartOne.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #5: Khusela -- Icandelo I
answers: Hayi. Yisoftware yomthombo ovulekileyo, kwaye ihlaselwa lula.
feedback: Kulungile. Enyanisweni, inethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin ayizange ifakwe. Phendula umbuzo olandelayo ukuze ufunde ngakumbi!
Kuhle ukuzama, kodwa kuphosakele. Inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ikhuselekile kwaye ikhuselekile - iiyure ze-24 ngosuku, iintsuku ze-365 ngonyaka.
Ayilunganga. Nangona i-bitcoin ngenene iyisoftware "evulekileyo" - okanye ifumaneka kuluntu simahla - isakhuseleke kakhulu.

securePartTwo.question: Ngaba i-Bitcoin yakha yaqhekezwa?
securePartTwo.text: Ukuthe ngqo: inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ngokwayo ayizange ikhutshwe. Zange nakanye. Ke yintoni kanye kanye eye yagqekezelwa? Izipaji ezithile zedijithali ezazingenalo ukhuseleko olufanelekileyo kwindawo. Kanye njenge-wallet ebonakalayo ibamba imali ye-fiat (ngendlela yamatyala ephepha), i-wallet yedijithali ibamba isixa se-bitcoin. Kwilizwe lenyama, izigebenga zikhuthuza iibhanki- kwaye zihambe neeDola zaseMelika. Into yokuba umntu aphange ibhanki ayinabo nabuphi na ubudlelwane bokuba iDola yaseMelika izinzile okanye iyimali ethembekileyo. Ngokufanayo, abanye abahlaseli bekhompyuter babile i-bitcoin kwizipaji zedijithali ezingakhuselekanga - i-intanethi ilingana nokuphangwa kwebhanki. Nangona kunjalo, kubalulekile ukwazi ukuba inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ayizange igqekezwe okanye ifakwe esichengeni!
securePartTwo.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #5: Khusela -- Icandelo II
answers: Ewe. I-Bitcoin ihlala iqhekezwa ngeeholide, xa iibhanki zemveli zivaliwe.
feedback: Liyinyani elo. Inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ayizange ifakwe phantsi. Nangona kunjalo, kubalulekile ukusebenzisa kuphela izipaji zedijithali ezikhuselekileyo ukugcina iibitcoins zakho zobuqu zikhuselekile ngamaxesha onke.
Ayivumi. Nceda uzame kwakhona
Hayi sisidenge, uyazi ukuba ayiyompendulo ichanekileyo leyo.

feedback.1: Uxolo, kodwa izinto eziqokelelwayo azisenzelwanga ukuboniswa nje kuphela - zinenjongo enzulu
feedback.2: Nangona izinto eziqokelelwayo zinokusebenza njengophawu lwesimo kwabanye, kuninzi okungaphaya kokuzibonisa nje.

originsOfMoney.question: Yintoni umsebenzi oyintloko nowamaxa onke wezinto eziqokelelwayo?
originsOfMoney.text:
Uluntu lwantlandlolo lwalurhweba ngokutshintshiselana, kodwa le ndlela yayineemfuno ezininzi. Enye ingxaki yayiyingxaki "yokufuna okukabini", apho abantu ababini kwakufuneka befuna into efanayo ngaxeshanye ukuze bagqibe urhwebo.

Ukuloyisa le ngxaki, abantu baqala ukuqokelela nokuxabisa izinto ezithile ngenxa yokunqaba kwazo nomqondiso wazo, njengamahlahla, amazinyo ezilwanyana, nelitye leflinti.

Ezi zinto ziqokelelweyo zasebenza njengendlela yokuba abantu bokuqala bagcine kwaye badlulisele ubutyebi, benikeza umahluko omkhulu ngaphezulu kwezinye iintlobo ezifana ne-Homo neanderthalensis.
originsOfMoney.title: Imvelaphi yemali

answers.0: Ukugcina ixabiso

feedback.0: Halala! Uchanekile (uxolo ngedlala yamagama). Izinto eziqokelelwayo zasebenza njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso kuluntu lwexesha lamandulo, ngokufanayo nendlela i-Bitcoin nezinye iimali zedijithali ezisetyenziswa ngayo namhlanje njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso ledijithali
feedback.1: Uxolo, izinto eziqokelelwayo zisenokuba mnandi ukuziqokelela, kodwa zazinenjongo ekwenzeni ngakumbi kuluntu lwamandulo
feedback.2: Izinto eziqokelelwayo zazingasetyenziswa rhoqo njengemali yanamhlanje, ngoko ke zazingadlali indima efanayo njengendlela yokutshintshiselana.

primitiveMoney.question: Yayiyintoni indima ephambili yezinto eziqokelelwayo kuluntu lwexesha lamandulo?
primitiveMoney.text:
Izinto eziqokelelwayo zasebenza njengomqalo wemali ngokuvumela urhwebo phakathi kwamaqela ahlukeneyo kunye nokuxhasa ukudluliswa kobutyebi phakathi kwezizukulwana. Nangona zazingasetyenziswa rhoqo njengemali yanamhlanje kuluntu lwexesha lamandulo, izinto eziqokelelwayo zasebenza njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso kwaye ngamanye amaxesha zazinokuxhasa urhwebo.

Iindlela zokuqala zemali, njengezinto eziqokelelwayo, zazinesantya esiphantsi xa kuthelekiswa nemali yanamhlanje kwaye zisenokudluliselwa amaxesha ambalwa kuphela ngexesha lobomi bomntu. Nangona kunjalo, izinto eziqokelelwayo ezihlala ixesha elide ezadluliselwa kwizizukulwana zazinexabiso elikhulu kurhwebo ngalunye kwaye ngamanye amaxesha zavumela urhwebo.
primitiveMoney.title: Iindlela zokuqala zemali

answers.0: Isakhono sokuthenga izinto eziqokelelwayo ngexabiso eliphantsi ngaphambi kokuba zifunwe ngokubanzi
answers.1: Isakhono sokutshintshiselana izinto eziqokelelwayo ngezinto ezinye eziluncedo
answers.2: Isakhono sokuchulumancisa abanye ngeqoqo labo lezinto ezinqabileyo nexabiso eliphezulu

feedback.0: Halala, uchanekile! Kubonakala ukuba ingcamango yokuba "thenga phantsi, thengisa phezulu" ayiyonto yala maxesha, njengoko nabantu bokuqala babefuna ukufumana izinto eziqokelelwayo ngexabiso eliphantsi ngaphambi kokuba imfuno nexabiso lazo lorhwebo linyuke. Into enomdla: lo mgaqo usebenza nakwi-Bitcoin, apho abo baqalayo bakwazi ukufumana ii-Bitcoin ngexabiso eliphantsi kakhulu ngaphambi kokuba ixabiso lazo linyuke kakhulu
feedback.1: Uxolo, leyo ayiyompendulo echanekileyo. Nangona ukwazi ukutshintshiselana izinto eziqokelelwayo ngezinto ezinye eziluncedo kunokuba yinzuzo yokulindela imfuno ngokuchanekileyo, yayingeyiyo inzuzo ephambili
feedback.2: Ndiyoyika ukuba leyo ayiyompendulo echanekileyo. Nangona ukuba neqoqo lezinto ezinqabileyo nexabiso eliphezulu kunokuba ngumthombo wokuzingca nokukhwelwa, yayingeyiyo inzuzo ephambili

anticipatingDemand.question: Yayiyintoni inzuzo ephambili yokukwazi ukulindela imfuno yekamva yezinto eziqokelelwayo kuluntu lokuqala lwabantu?
anticipatingDemand.text:
Ukukhetha izinto eziza kuqokelelwa okanye ukwenziwa kwaba yingxaki ebalulekileyo kubantu bokuqala, njengoko kwakufuneka balindele izinto eziya kufunwa ngabanye. Isakhono sokulindela ngokuchanekileyo izinto eziya kufunwa ngexabiso lazo lokuba ziqokelelwe sasinika inzuzo ebalulekileyo kumnini ngokwamandla abo orhwebo nokuqokelela ubutyebi.

Ezinye iintlanga zaseMelika, njenge-Narragansetts, zazijolise ekuveliseni izinto eziqokelelwayo ezazingenasebenziso lungako, kodwa zazixabisekile ekurhwebeni.

Kukhawuleza ukulindelwa kokuba into eqokelelwayo iya kufunwa kwikamva, kuba nzulu inzuzo yomnini wayo, njengoko inokufumaneka ngexabiso eliphantsi ngaphambi kokuba ifunwe ngokubanzi kwaye ixabiso layo lorhwebo linyuke njengoko abantu abayifunayo besanda.
anticipatingDemand.title: Ukulindela Imfuno

answers.0: Ingcamango enceda uluntu ukugqiba kwindawo enye yokugcina ixabiso
answers.1: Uhlobo lomdaniso okhuthaza urhwebo nokwahlulwa komsebenzi
answers.2: Isixhobo somculo esenza kube lula ukwenza urhwebo kunye nokugxila kwimisebenzi eyahlukeneyo

feedback.0: Halala, uchanekile! I-Nash Equilibrium yingcamango kwithiyori yomdlalo ebhekisa kumeko apho akukho mdlali unokufikelela kwinzuzo ngokutshintsha icebo labo. Kwimeko yokukhethwa kwendawo yokugcina ixabiso, ukufikelela kwi-Nash Equilibrium kuthetha ukuba uluntu lufikelele kwindawo enye yokugcina ixabiso, nto leyo elula kakhulu urhwebo nokwahlulwa komsebenzi. Into enomdla: i-Bitcoin ihlala ibonwa njengomzekelo we-Nash Equilibrium, njengoko iyimali yedijithali ephambili ngenxa yexabiso layo elivunyelweyo namkelwe ngokubanzi
feedback.1: Uxolo, leyo ayiyompendulo echanekileyo. Nangona i-Nash Equilibrium ingenanto yakwenza nomdaniso, yingcamango ebalulekileyo kwithiyori yomdlalo enokunceda uluntu
feedback.2: Ndiyoyika ukuba leyo ayiyompendulo echanekileyo. Nangona umculo unokuhlanganisa abantu kunye nokuxhasa intsebenziswano, i-Nash Equilibrium ayinanto yakwenza nezixhobo zomculo. Yingcamango kwithiyori yomdlalo ebhekisa kumeko apho akukho mdlali unokufikelela kwinzuzo ngokutshintsha icebo labo.

nashEquilibrium.question: Yintoni i-Nash Equilibrium kwaye inceda njani uluntu?
nashEquilibrium.text:
Ukufumana into ngokulindela ukuba iya kufunwa njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso kwikamva kunokukhawulezisa ukamkelwa kwayo kuloo njongo. Le nkqubo inokudala umdla oqhubekayo owenza uluntu lufikelele kwindawo enye yokugcina ixabiso.

Kwithiyori yomdlalo, oku kwaziwa ngokuba yi-"Nash Equilibrium". Ukufikelela kwi-Nash Equilibrium kwindawo yokugcina ixabiso kunokunceda kakhulu uluntu, kuba kwenza urhwebo nokwahlulwa komsebenzi kube lula kwaye kuvule indlela yokuphuhliswa kwesingqongileyo.
nashEquilibrium.title: Isitshixo Sokuxhasa Urhwebo

answers.0: Ukukhulisa amandla okuthenga onogcino lwabo

feedback.0: Kuchanekile! Abarhwebi nabathengisi babenentshukumo yokukhuthaza ukamkelwa kwendawo yokugcina ixabiso yangaphandle kuluntu lwabo kuba kwakukhulisa amandla okuthenga onogcino lwabo. Oku akuzange kuncede abarhwebi kuphela, kodwa noluntu ngokubanzi, njengoko ukamkelwa kwendawo enye yokugcina ixabiso kwanciphisa iindleko zokugqiba urhwebo nezinye iintlalo kwaye kwandisa ubutyebi obusekwe kurhwebo. Into enomdla: i-Bitcoin ingumzekelo wendawo yokugcina ixabiso ekamkelwe luhlanga oluninzi, kwaye ukamkelwa kwayo ngokubanzi kukhulise amandla okuthenga kwaye kuxhase urhwebo

feedback.2: Ndiyoyika ukuba leyo ayiyompendulo echanekileyo. Nangona ukubonisa ubutyebi nesimo kunokuba yintshukumo kwabanye abantu, yayingeyiyo isizathu esiphambili sokuba kutheni abarhwebi nabathengisi babenentshukumo yokukhuthaza ukamkelwa kwendawo yokugcina ixabiso yangaphandle kuluntu lwabo.

singleStoreOfValue.question: Kutheni abarhwebi nabathengisi kuluntu lokuqala lwabantu babenentshukumo yokukhuthaza ukamkelwa kwendawo yokugcina ixabiso yangaphandle kuluntu lwabo?
singleStoreOfValue.text:
Njengoko uluntu lwabantu neendlela zorhwebo zaphuhliswa ngokuhamba kwexesha, iindawo zokugcina ixabiso ezavela kuluntu olwahlukeneyo zaqala ukukhuphisana. Abarhwebi nabathengisi kwafuneka bagqibe enoba bogcina inzuzo yabo kwindawo yokugcina ixabiso yoluntu lwabo okanye kwindawo yokugcina ixabiso yoluntu ababerhweba nalo, okanye imbonakalo yazo zombini.

Ukugcina onogcino kwindawo yokugcina ixabiso yangaphandle kwanika abarhwebi isakhono sokugqiba urhwebo ngokululaeloluntwini, kwaye kwabavuzela nangentshukumo yokukhuthaza ukamkelwa kwaloo ndawo yokugcina ixabiso kuluntu lwabo, njengoko kwakuya kukhulisa amandla okuthenga onogcino lwabo.

Xa uluntu olubini lwamkela indawo enye yokugcina ixabiso, lubona unciphiso olukhulu kwiindleko zorhwebo phakathi kwabo kunye nokukhula kobutyebi obusekwe kurhwebo. Kwinkulungwane ye-19, inkoliso yehlabathi yafikelela kwindawo enye yokugcina ixabiso - igolide - kwaye eli xesha labona ukukhula okukhulu kurhwebo kumbali.
singleStoreOfValue.title: Iinzuzo Zokufikelela KwiNdawo Enye Yokugcina Ixabiso

whatIsGoodSOV.question: Zeziphi iimpawu ezenza indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso?
whatIsGoodSOV.text:
Xa iindawo zokugcina ixabiso zikhuphisana, iimpawu ezenza indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso ziyivumela ukuba igqwese abakhuphisani bayo kwaye yandise imfuno ngokuhamba kwexesha.

Iimpahla ezininzi zisetyenzisiwe njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso kodwa iimpawu ezithile zifunwa ngokukhethekileyo kwaye zivumela ezi mpahla zibe nempumelelo ngakumbi.

Indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso kufanele ihlale ixesha elide, ithwaleke, itshintshiselane, iqinisekiseke, yahlulelane, inqabe, ibe nembali ende, kwaye imelane nokucinezelwa.
whatIsGoodSOV.title: Ezinye iindawo zokugcina ixabiso zibhetele kunezinye

answers.0: Inethiwekhi ekhusela imali

feedback.0: Uchanekile. Inethiwekhi ekhusela imali yinto ebalulekileyo ekuchongeni ukuhlala kwayo ixesha elide, ngakumbi kwiimali zedijithali njengo-bitcoin. Ubusazi ukuba i-bitcoin ibonise umgangatho ophezulu woku"melana neengxaki" phezu kwemizamo yokuyilawula namahlasela abaqhekezi? Oko kuchulumancisa kakhulu ngemali esasebudaleni bayo
feedback.1: Hayi, uxolo! Imbonakalo yomzimba yemali okunene ayibalulekanga kangako njengombutho oyikhuphayo okanye inethiwekhi eyikhuselayo. Ungaxhali nangona kunjalo, awuwedwa ekwenzeni le mpazamo. NamaGrike amandulo ayeshaya iimali zawo ngeempahla eziphelelwa lixesha njengobhedu nesinyithi
feedback.2: Kufutshane, kodwa hayi kanye! Umbutho okhupha imali okunene yinto ebalulekileyo ekuchongeni ukuhlala kwayo ixesha elide. Kodwa, ubungekho wedwa kule mpazamo. Zininzi oorhulumente neemali ezifikileyo nezihambileyo kule nkulungwane.

durability.question: Yeyiphi kwezi zilandelayo into ebalulekileyo ekuchongeni ukuhlala ixesha elide kwendawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso?
durability.text:
Impahla esetyenziswa njengemali akufanele ibole okanye itshatyalaliswe lula. Igolide yaziwa ngokuhlala kwayo ixesha elide kwaye ihlala ithathwa njenge"nkumkani" kulo mba.

Inxalenye enkulu yegolide eyakhe yembiwa okanye yashaywa, kuquka igolide yamaFaro, isekho namhlanje kwaye kusenokwenzeka ukuba iya kuhlala ikho iminyaka emininzi. Iimali zegolide ezazisetyenziswa njengemali kumaxesha amandulo zisenexabiso elibalulekileyo namhlanje.

Iimali ze-fiat nee-bitcoin ziirekhodi zedijithali ezinokuthatha imbonakalo yomzimba, njengamaphepha edola. Nangona kunjalo, ayiyiyo imbonakalo yomzimba yezi mali ekufanele iqwalaselwe ngokuhlala kwazo ixesha elide, kodwa kunoko ukuhlala ixesha elide kombutho ozikhuphayo.

Oorhulumente abaninzi neemali zabo bafikile bahamba kule nkulungwane, ngelixa abanye, njenge-US dollar ne-British pound, basinde ixesha elide. Ii-bitcoin azinagunya lizikhuphayo, ngoko ukuhlala kwazo ixesha elide kuxhomekeke kwinethiwekhi ezikhuselayo. Nangona kusekulusuku ukutsala izigqibo ezinamandla ngokuhlala ixesha elide kwee-bitcoin, kukho iimpawu zokuba inethiwekhi ibonise umgangatho ophezulu woku"melana neengxaki" phezu kwemizamo yokuyilawula namahlasela abaqhekezi.
durability.title: Ukuhlala ixesha elide yimpawu ebalulekileyo yendawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso

answers.0: Imbonakalo yayo yomzimba
answers.2: Isakhono sayo sokuxhasa urhwebo lwemigama emide

feedback.0: Uchanekile. Imbonakalo yomzimba yempahla ayiyiyo into eyenza ithwaleke. Ngokwenene, iimali zedijithali njengo-bitcoin ziindawo zokugcina ixabiso ezithwaleka kakhulu kuba zinokugcinwa lula kwisixhobo esincinci kwaye zithunyelwe ngokukhawuleza imigama emide. Ubusazi ukuba izitshixo zabucala ezimele amakhulu ezigidi zeedola zinokugcinwa kwi-USB encinci kwaye zithwalwe lula naphi na nge-bitcoin? Yinto echulumancisayo
feedback.1: Uxolo, akuchanekanga! Isakhono sokuthwaleka lula nokugcinwa okunene yinto ebalulekileyo eyenza indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso ithwaleke. Kodwa ungaxhali, yimpazamo eqhelekileyo. Ekuqaleni, ngubani ongafuniyo ukuthwala inkomo njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso?
feedback.2: Yhoo, leyo ayiyompendulo echanekileyo! Isakhono sokuxhasa urhwebo lwemigama emide okunene yinto ebalulekileyo eyenza indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso ithwaleke. Kodwa ubungekho wedwa kule mpazamo.

portability.question: Yeyiphi kwezi zilandelayo ENGEYO into eyenza indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso ithwaleke?
portability.text:
"Ukuthwaleka" kubhekisa ekubeni kulula kangakanani ukuhambisa okanye ukuthwala impahla ukusuka kwindawo enye uye kwenye.

Ii-bitcoin zithwaleka kakhulu, zivumela ukugcinwa lula kwi-USB encinci nokuthunyelwa ngokukhawuleza imigama emide. Ngokufanayo, iimali ze-fiat zikwazedijithali ngoko ke zithwaleka, kodwa imithetho karhulumente nemithetho yolawulo lwemali inokwenza ukudluliswa kwexabiso elikhulu kube nzima okanye kungenakwenzeka.

Kwelinye icala, igolide, ekubeni iyinto yomzimba kwaye inzima kakhulu, yeyona ndawo yokugcina ixabiso ethwaleka kancinci, ngelixa inkoliso yegolide ingaze ithwalwe kwaye ukudluliswa kwegolide yomzimba kubiza, kuyingozi, kwaye kuthatha ixesha.
portability.title: Impahla kufanele ithwaleke lula kwaye igcinwe

answers.0: Imbonakalo nomgangatho weedayimani awuhambelani

feedback.0: Kanye njalo! Imbonakalo nomgangatho ongahambelaniyo weedayimani wenza zibe nokutshintshiselana ngaphantsi kunegolide, yiyo le nto igolide ithathwa njengefungible ngakumbi. Ubukwazi ukuba i-bitcoin ithathwa njengefungible kwinqanaba lenethiwekhi, kodwa ukulandelelwa kwayo kwi-blockchain ngamanye amaxesha kunokwenza iphathwe njengento engenakutshintshiselana ngabarhwebi okanye amaqonga okutshintshiselana?
feedback.1: Impendulo engachanekanga! Igolide inokuba nexabiso eliphezulu kuneedayimani, kodwa leyo ayiyiyo isizathu esiphambili sokuba ithathwe njengefungible ngakumbi. Kubonakala ngathi ufuna ukufunda ngakumbi ngokufungibility
feedback.2: Hayi, uxolo! Nangona igolide inokuba yintabalala ngaphezulu kuneedayimani, leyo ayiyiyo isizathu esiphambili sokuba ithathwe njengefungible ngakumbi. Amathamsanqa kwixesha elizayo!

fungibility.question: Yintoni isizathu esiphambili sokuba igolide ithathwe njengefungible ngaphezulu kuneedayimani?
fungibility.text:
"Ukufungibility" kuthetha ukuba iyunithi enye yemali ingatshintshiselana nenye iyunithi yemali efanayo. Le yimpawu ebalulekileyo yendawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso.

Igolide yindawo yokugcina ixabiso efungible kakhulu, kuba xa inyibilikisiwe, i-aunsi yegolide okunene ayahlukani nayiphi na enye. Iimali ze-fiat, kwelinye icala, zisenokungabi fungible ngokupheleleyo, kuba amaziko azikhuphayo anokuphatha iidenomieshini ezahlukeneyo ngokwahlukeneyo.

Njengegolide, iiyunithi ze-bitcoin zifungible, kodwa kukho iinkcukacha ezithile. Siya kungena koku kwisahluko esilandelayo.
fungibility.title: Isampuli enye kufanele itshintshiselane nenye yesixa esilinganayo

answers.0: Ngokusebenzisa utyikityo lwe-cryptographic
answers.2: Ngokujonga iimpawu kwamaphepha emali ukuthintela ukwenziwa kwemali yobuxoki

feedback.0: Halala! Uchanekile. I-Bitcoin inokuqinisekiswa ngoqiniseko lwezibalo isebenzisa utyikityo lwe-cryptographic
feedback.1: Uxolo, kodwa akuchanekanga kanye. Amathamsanqa kwixesha elizayo
feedback.2: Akuchanekanga! I-Bitcoin yeyedijithali ngokupheleleyo kwaye ayisebenzisi maphepha emali. Zama kwakhona!

verifiability.question: Ingaqinisekiswa njani i-bitcoin?
verifiability.text:
Kubalulekile ukuba indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso iqinisekiswe lula njengeyokwenene. Oku kukhulisa ukuthemba kurhwebo kunye namathuba okuba urhwebo lugqitywe.

Zomibini iimali ze-fiat negolide zinokuqinisekiswa ngokubaqala, kodwa azinakuphumelela rhoqo. Iimali zobuxoki negolide ye-tungsten egqunywe zisetyenzisiwe ukukhohlisa abantu kwixesha elidlulileyo.

Kwelinye icala, ukusetyenziswa kwe-cryptography kwenza ukuqinisekisa kube lula kakhulu kwi-bitcoin kwaye kwenza ukwenza ubuxoki kungenakwenzeka.
verifiability.title: Impahla kufanele iqinisekiswe lula njengeyokwenene

answers.0: Igolide

feedback.0: Uchanekile. Igolide inzima ukwahlulwa kubuninzi obuncinci borhwebo lwemihla ngemihla. Ubusazi ukuba igolide isetyenzisiwe njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso amawaka eminyaka ngenxa yokunqaba kwayo nokuhlala ixesha elide?
feedback.1: Uxolo, kodwa akuchanekanga kanye. I-Bitcoin iyahluleka kakhulu kwiyunithi yayo yesiseko 'satoshi', kwaye inokuhlulwa kwimilli-satoshis (1/1000 ye-satoshi) kwiNethiwekhi ye-Lightning
feedback.2: Hayi. Nangona iimali ze-fiat zingahluleki njenge-bitcoin, ziyahluleka lula kwiidenomieshini ezincinci.

divisibility.question: Yeyiphi kwezi zilandelayo ENGEYO indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso ngenxa yobunzima bayo bokwahlulwa lula kurhwebo lwemihla ngemihla?
divisibility.text:
Isakhono sokwahlula impahla yimpawu ebalulekileyo ukuba ibe yindawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso.

Cinga ukuba une-$100 bill kwaye ufuna ukuthenga ipaki yetsuwingam ebiza iisenthe ezili-10. Impumelelo yorhwebo ixhomekeke ekubeni umthengisi abe ne-$99.90 yotshintsho efumanekayo ngelo xesha.

Kuluntu apho urhwebo luvame khona, isakhono sokwahlula impahla kubuninzi obuncinci sivumela ukutshintshiselana okuchanekileyo kwaye kunokwenza kube lula ukuyisebenzisa kurhwebo lwemihla ngemihla.

I-Bitcoin iluncedo ngokukhethekileyo kulo mba, kuba inokuhlulwa ukuya kwisigidi sekhulu seyunithi kwaye ithunyelwe ngemali encinci nechanekileyo.

Iimali ze-fiat ngokuqhelekileyo ziyahluleka ukuya kutshintsho lwepokotho, elinexabiso eliphantsi lokuthenga, okwenza i-fiat yahluleke ngokwaneleyo ngokwenzayo.

Igolide, nangona iyahluleka ngomzimba, inokuba nzima ukuyisebenzisa ngobuninzi obuncinci kurhwebo lwemihla ngemihla.
divisibility.title: Impahla kufanele yahlulwe lula

answers.0: Ukunqaba

feedback.0: Halala! Uchanekile. Ubusazi ukuba kuya kubakho ubuncinane be-21 yezigidi zee-bitcoin ezikhoyo, okwenza ibe yinto enqabileyo nexabiso eliphezulu?
feedback.1: Uxolo, kodwa ukuba yintabalala ayiyiyo impawu ebaluleke kakhulu yendawo yokugcina ixabiso. Amathamsanqa kwixesha elizayo
feedback.2: Uxolo, kodwa ukwenziwa lula ayiyiyo impawu ebaluleke kakhulu yendawo yokugcina ixabiso. Amathamsanqa kwixesha elizayo!

scarce.question: Yintoni impawu ebaluleke kakhulu yendawo yokugcina ixabiso?
scarce.text:
Indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso kufanele ibe nomthamo omncinci, okanye inqabe.

Oku kungenxa yokuba ukunqaba kunokudala ixabiso, kuba abantu bahlala befuna izinto ezinqabileyo okanye ezinzima ukuzifumana. I-Bitcoin, umzekelo, yenzelwe ukuba ibe nobuncinane be-21 yezigidi zeeyunithi, okunika umnini ngamnye ipesente eyaziwayo yomthamo opheleleyo onokubanakho.

Ngokwahlukileyo, umthamo wegolide unokukhula ngeendlela ezintsha zokumba, kwaye iimali ze-fiat zihlala zikhokelela kunyuko lwamaxabiso, okukhokelela ekuhleni kwexabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha.
scarce.title: Impahla yemali kufanele inqabe

answers.0: Ofika entsha unenzuzo enkulu ngaphezulu kwempahla esekiweyo
answers.1: Impahla esekiweyo inembali ende yokuxabiswa luluntu

feedback.0: Uchanekile. Indawo yokugcina ixabiso esekwe ixesha elide ayisenakususwa lula ngofika entsha ngaphandle kokuba ofika entsha unenzuzo enkulu ngaphezulu kwempahla esekiweyo
feedback.1: Uxolo, kodwa oku okunene sisizathu sokuba indawo yokugcina ixabiso esekwe ixesha elide inga sukususwa lula. Amathamsanqa kwixesha elizayo
feedback.2: Hayi, akuchanekanga. Ubungamanyelanga kwisifundo esidlulileyo ngokunqaba?

establishedHistory.question: Yintoni isizathu esiphambili sokuba indawo yokugcina ixabiso esekwe ixesha elide inokususwa ngofika entsha?
establishedHistory.text:
Oku kungenxa yokuba indawo yokugcina ixabiso esekiweyo kakuhle ayisenakususwa lula ngofika entsha, ngaphandle kokuba unenzuzo enkulu ngaphezulu kwempahla esekiweyo.

Ukongezelela, abantu zizidalwa zemikhwa kwaye baya kuqhubeka besebenzisa into abasele beyazi.

Igolide, umzekelo, inembali ende yokuxabiswa kwaye igcine ixabiso layo ngokuhamba kwexesha. Ngokwahlukileyo, iimali ze-fiat, eziyinto entsha ngokumparelelo, zinesimo sokunciphisa ixabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha ngenxa yokunyuka kwamaxabiso.

I-Bitcoin, nangona ibekho ixesha elifutshane kuphela, ibonise ukomelela kwimarike kwaye kusenokwenzeka ukuba iya kuqhubeka ixabiseka.
establishedHistory.title: Imbali esekiweyo yokuxabiswa luluntu

answers.0: Inethiwekhi yayo engalawulwayo, ye-peer-to-peer

feedback.0: Uchanekile. Inethiwekhi engalawulwayo, ye-peer-to-peer ye-Bitcoin ivumela ukuba urhwebo lwenziwe ngaphandle kwemvume, okwenza ibe yimpahla emelana nocinezelwano
feedback.1: Hayi. Ngokwenene, iimpahla zomzimba zihlala zifuna imvume yokuwela imida kwaye zinokuthinjwa lula. Amathamsanqa kwixesha elizayo
feedback.2: Uxolo, kodwa ngokwenene ichasene noko. Inkqubo yebhanki ye-fiat, elawulwa ngamazwe, ifuna ungenelelo lomntu ukuchaza nokuthintela iindlela ezithile zokusetyenziswa kwemali, okwenza ibe nokuqheli ukucinezelwa. Zama kwakhona!

censorshipResistance.question: Yeyiphi kwezi zilandelayo isizathu sokuba i-Bitcoin ithathwe njengempahla emelana nocinezelwano?
censorshipResistance.text:
Ukumelana nocinezelwano yimpawu eye yaba baluleke ngakumbi kwixesha ledijithali, kuba ibhekisa kubunzima obunazo amaqela angaphandle, njengeenkampani okanye oorhulumente, ekuthinteleni umntu ukuba asebenzise impahla ethile.

Le mpawu ixabiseka ngokukhethekileyo kubantu abahlala phantsi korhulumente abaphumeza ulawulo lwemali okanye abavala iindlela ezithile zorhwebo. I-Bitcoin ihlala ichazwa njengempahla emelana nocinezelwano ngenxa yenethiwekhi yayo engalawulwayo, ye-peer-to-peer, evumela ukuba urhwebo lwenziwe ngaphandle kongenelelo lomntu okanye imvume.

Ngokwahlukileyo, inkqubo yebhanki ye-fiat ilawulwa ngamazwe kwaye ifuna ungenelelo lomntu ukuchaza nokuthintela iindlela ezithile zokusetyenziswa kwemali, njengolawulo lwemali.

Igolide, nangona ingakhutshelwanga ngamazwe, inokuba nzima ukuyithunela umgama ngoko ke ithobela ulawulo lwelizwe ngakumbi.
censorshipResistance.title: Akufuneki mvume

answers.0: Ukusetyenziswa kwemali njengendlela yokutshintshiselana iimpahla neenkonzo

feedback.0: Halala, uchanekile! Kuchulumancisa ukuphawula ukuba ukusetyenziswa kwemali njengendlela yokutshintshiselana kuye kwaba balulekile ngakumbi kumaxesha anamhlanje ngenxa yokukhula kweendlela zokuhlawula nge-elektroniki
feedback.1: Akuchanekanga! Kodwa kuhle ukuba unomdla kwimbali yemali. Zama kwakhona
feedback.2: Uxolo, akuchanekanga. Kuyinyaniso ukuba oorhulumente banolawulo oluninzi ekudalweni nasekukhupheni imali, kodwa akukuko okona kubalulekileyo kwi-economics yemali yanamhlanje. Zama kwakhona!

evolutionMoney.question: Yintoni ekubalulekileyo kwi-economics yemali yanamhlanje?
evolutionMoney.text:
Kumaxesha anamhlanje, abantu abaninzi kwicandelo le-economics yemali bajolise kwingcamango yokuba imali isetyenziswa ngokukodwa njengendlela yokutshintshiselana iimpahla neenkonzo.

Kwinkulungwane edlulileyo, nangona kunjalo, oorhulumente babe namandla odwa okudala imali kwaye bahlala besenza kube nzima ukuba imali igcine ixabiso layo. Oku kwenza abantu bakholelwe ukuba injongo ephambili yemali kukusetyenziswa ekutshintshiseleni.

Abanye bathe i-Bitcoin ayiyo indlela elungileyo yemali kuba ixabiso layo litshintsha kakhulu ukuba isetyenziswe ngokufanelekileyo kurhwebo.

Nangona kunjalo, le ndlela yokucinga iyabuyisa. Kumbali, ukusetyenziswa kwemali kuphuhliswe ngamanqanaba, apho ixabiso layo njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso likhokele ngaphambi kokusetyenziswa kwayo njengendlela yokutshintshiselana.
evolutionMoney.title: Ukuguqulwa Kwemali

answers.0: Amahlahla, iintsimbi, negolide

feedback.0: Halala, uchanekile! Kuchulumancisa ukuphawula ukuba amahlahla, iintsimbi, negolide zonke zazixabiswa ngenxa yembonakalo yazo okanye iimpawu zazo ezikhethekileyo ngaphambi kokuba zisetyenziswe ngokubanzi njengemali
feedback.1: Uxolo, akuchanekanga. Iimali zobhedu nesilivere zazingasetyenziswa njengemali ekuqaleni kokuguqulwa kwayo
feedback.2: Akuchanekanga! Kodwa ubuncinane ucinga ngeendlela zemali zanamhlanje. Amaphepha emali anemifanekiso yeenkokheli ezidumileyo awazange asetyenziswe ekuqaleni kokuguqulwa kwemali.

collectible.question: Yayiyintoni imizekelo yokuqala yeendlela zemali ezazixabiswa ngenxa yembonakalo okanye iimpawu zazo ezikhethekileyo?
collectible.text:
Kumbali, imali ihambe ngeenqanaba ezine zokuphuhliswa. Ekuqaleni, abantu babefuna imali kuphela ngenxa yeempawu zayo ezikhethekileyo, kwaye yayibonwa ngokukodwa njengento yomhombiso okanye into eqokelelwayo.

Imizekelo yoku iquka amahlahla, iintsimbi, negolide, ezonke zezinto ezaziqokelelwa ngaphambi kokuba zisetyenziswe ngokubanzi njengemali.
collectible.title: Amanqanaba Amane Emali: Into Eqokelelwayo

answers.0: Inani labantu abayifunayo njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso

feedback.0: Umsebenzi omhle! Amandla okuthenga endawo yokugcina ixabiso achongwa linani labantu abafuna ukuyisebenzisa njengendlela yokugcina ixabiso. Njengoko abantu abaninzi befuna ukuyisebenzisa kule njongo, ixabiso lendawo yokugcina ixabiso liyakhula
feedback.1: Uxolo, imozulu ngokuqinisekileyo yinto echaphazela izinto ezininzi, kodwa ayiyiyo impendulo echanekileyo yalo mbuzo. Mhlawumbi zama ukujonga ezinye izinto ezinokuchaphazela ixabiso lendawo yokugcina ixabiso
feedback.2: Ndiyaxolisa ukuthi umbala wendawo yokugcina ixabiso mhlawumbi awuchaphazeli amandla ayo okuthenga. Yingcamango echulumancisayo nangona kunjalo! Mhlawumbi zama ukuqwalasela ezinye iimpawu ezinokuchaphazela ixabiso lendawo yokugcina ixabiso.

storeOfValue.question: Yintoni echonga amandla okuthenga endawo yokugcina ixabiso?
storeOfValue.text:
Indawo yokugcina ixabiso linqanaba lesibini lokuguqulwa kwemali. Xa abantu abaneleyo befuna imali ngenxa yeempawu zayo ezikhethekileyo, iba yindlela yokugcina nokonga ixabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha, yokuthwala ubutyebi obuzuzwe ngobunzima ukuya kwikamva.

Njengoko abantu abaninzi beqaphela impahla njengendlela elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso, ixabiso lempahla liyakhula njengoko abantu abaninzi beyifuna kule njongo.

Ekugqibeleni, ixabiso lendawo yokugcina ixabiso liya kuyeka ukukhula njengoko ithathwa ngokubanzi kwaye abantu abambalwa abantsha beyifuna njengendawo yokugcina ixabiso.
storeOfValue.title: Amanqanaba Amane Emali: Indawo Yokugcina Ixabiso

answers.0: Ixesha lokuqala i-bitcoin yaba nexabiso lemarike

feedback.0: Uchanekile. Usuku lwe-Bitcoin Pizza lubhiyozelwa ukuphawula ixesha lokuqala i-bitcoin yaba nexabiso lemarike, ngeloxesha uLaszlo Hanyecz watshintsha i-bitcoin eziyi-10,000 ngeepizza ezimbini. Sisiganeko esibalulekileyo ekuguqulweni kwe-bitcoin
feedback.1: Nangona ipayinaphu isisiqhamo esihle, ayinandawo kwipizza yokwenene! Ngaphandle kwale nqaku eseceleni, impendulo yakho ayichanekanga. Zama kwakhona
feedback.2: Uxolo, iresiphi yepiiza eyona ilungileyo ixhomekeke kuwe. Nangona ipizza isoloko imnandi, ayiyo eyona nto ibalulekileyo kwUsuku lwe-Bitcoin Pizza. Mhlawumbi zama ukuqwalasela ukubaluleka kwesiganeko kumbali ye-bitcoin.

mediumOfExchange.question: Ubhiyozelwa ntoni Usuku lwe-Bitcoin Pizza?
mediumOfExchange.text:
Xa imali isetyenziswa ukugcina ixabiso, ixabiso layo liya kuzinza ekugqibeleni. Naxa ixabiso lemali lizinzile, iba yeyona ndlela ilungileyo yokuxhasa urhwebo kuba ilula ukuyisebenzisa kwaye ayinomthwalo wokudibana wokutshintshiselana.

Kwiintsuku zokuqala ze-Bitcoin ngo-2010, abanye abantu abazange bayiqaphele indleko yethuba lokusebenzisa i-Bitcoin njengendlela yokutshintshiselana endaweni yendawo yokugcina ixabiso entsha.

Kukho ibali elidumileyo likaLaszlo Hanyecz owatshintsha i-bitcoin eziyi-10,000 (ezazixabisa malunga ne-$165 yezigidi ngexesha lokubhalwa oku) ngeepizza nje ezimbini. Xa uLaszlo wafumana ezo pizza, kwaphawula ixesha lokuqala i-bitcoin yaba nexabiso lemarike.

Namhlanje, ipizza kaLaszlo ibhiyozelwa kwihlabathi lonke ngoMeyi 22 njengoSuku lwe-Bitcoin Pizza njengenyathelo elibalulekileyo nomqobo ekuguqulweni kwe-bitcoin njengemali.
mediumOfExchange.title: Amanqanaba Amane Emali: Indlela Yokutshintshiselana

answers.0: Xa abarhwebi bevuma ukuyamkela njengentlawulo ngaphandle kokuqwalasela isixa sokutshintshiselana neemali ezinye

feedback.0: Halala! Ukuze i-bitcoin ithathwe njengeyunithi yakhawunti, kufuneka yamkelwe ngokubanzi njengendlela yokuhlawula ngaphandle kokuqwalasela isixa sokutshintshiselana neemali ezinye. Oku kuthetha ukuba abarhwebi bangavuma ukuyamkela njengentlawulo ngaphandle kokuqwalasela ixabiso le-bitcoin ngeemali ezinye
feedback.1: Ndiyaxolisa, kodwa nangona i-ayisikhrimu imnandi, ayiyiyo impendulo echanekileyo. Mhlawumbi zama ukuqwalasela ezinye izinto ezinokuchaphazela ukamkelwa kwe-bitcoin njengeyunithi yakhawunti
feedback.2: Ukudlala imidlalo nabahlobo kusoloko kumnandi, kodwa ngeshwa ayiyiyo impendulo echanekileyo. Mhlawumbi zama ukucinga ngoko kwakufuneka ukuze i-bitcoin yamkelwe ngokubanzi njengendlela yokuhlawula.

unitOfAccount.question: Inokuthathwa njani i-bitcoin njengeyunithi yakhawunti?
unitOfAccount.text:
Xa imali isetyenziswa ngokubaqala ekurhwebeni, iimpahla zixabiswa ngayo. Oku kuthetha ukuba iimpahla ezininzi zinokutshintshiselana ngemali ngesixa esithile.

Akuchanekanga ukuthi iimpahla ezininzi zinokuthengwa nge-bitcoin namhlanje. Umzekelo, nangona ikomityi yekofu inokufumaneka ngokuthenga usebenzisa i-bitcoin, ixabiso elibhalwe phantsi asiyiyo ixabiso lokwenene le-bitcoin. Endaweni yoko, lixabiso ledola elifunwa ngumrhwebi, eliguqulelwe kwi-bitcoin ngokusekwe kwisixa sokutshintshiselana sangoku phakathi kweedola ne-bitcoin.

Ukuba ixabiso le-bitcoin liyehla ngokweedola, umrhwebi uya kucela i-bitcoin eninzi ukuze ilingane nesixa esifanayo seedola.

I-Bitcoin inokuthathwa kuphela njengeyunithi yakhawunti (indlela eqhelekileyo yokulinganisa ixabiso leempahla) xa abarhwebi bevuma ukuyamkela njengentlawulo ngaphandle kokuqwalasela isixa sokutshintshiselana neemali ezinye.
unitOfAccount.title: Amanqanaba Amane Emali: Iyunithi Yakhawunti

answers.0: Impahla engekamkelwa ngokubanzi njengeyunithi yakhawunti
answers.2: Impahla esetyenziswa njengendlela yokutshintshiselana kodwa hayi yokugcina ixabiso okanye yokulinganisa ixabiso leempahla

feedback.0: Halala! Ukhethe impendulo echanekileyo. Impahla eguqulelwe ngokuyinxenye yileyo engekamkelwa ngokubanzi njengeyunithi yakhawunti, okuthetha ukuba ayisetyenziswa ngokuqhelekileyo njengendlela eqhelekileyo yokulinganisa ixabiso leempahla ezinye. Oku kunokuquka iimpahla njengegolide, ehlala isetyenziselwa ukugcina ixabiso kodwa ingesetyenziswa ngokuqhelekileyo kurhwebo lwemihla ngemihla
feedback.1: Yimpendulo echulumancisayo, kodwa ngeshwa ayichanekanga kanye. Amathamsanqa kwixesha elizayo
feedback.2: Hayi kanye, kodwa kufutshane! Qhubeka ucinga.

partlyMonetized.question: Lithetha ntoni igama elithi "iguqulelwe ngokuyinxenye"?
partlyMonetized.text:
Iimpahla ezingamkelwa ngokubanzi njengeyunithi yakhawunti zinokuthathwa njengezi "guqulelwe ngokuyinxenye" kuba zisetyenziselwa ezinye iinjongo ezinxulumene nemali, kodwa hayi zonke.

Igolide ingumzekelo wempahla eguqulelwe ngokuyinxenye esetyenziselwa ukugcina ixabiso kodwa ingasetyenziswa ngokubanzi njengendlela yokutshintshiselana okanye iyunithi yakhawunti. Kwamanye amazwe, iimpahla ezahlukeneyo zinokusetyenziselwa iinjongo ezahlukeneyo ezinxulumene nemali, njengempahla enye isetyenziselwa ukutshintshiselana nenye isetyenziselwa ukugcina ixabiso okanye iyunithi yakhawunti.

Idola ingumzekelo wempahla esetyenziswa ngokubanzi kuzo zonke iinjongo ezintathu zemali eMelika, ngelixa ipeso yayingumzekelo wempahla eyayisetyenziswa njengendlela yokutshintshiselana eArgentina kodwa yayingeyiyo indawo elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso ngenxa yokungathembeki kwayo nokulahleka kwamandla okuthenga rhoqo.
partlyMonetized.title: Ukuguqulelwa Ngokuyinxenye

answers.0: Ikwinkqubo yokuba yamkelwe ngokubanzi njengemali
answers.1: Ngoku isetyenziswa njengendlela yokutshintshiselana iimpahla neenkonzo, njengeemali ezinye.
answers.2: Sele igqibile inkqubo yokuba yamkelwe ngokubanzi njengemali kwaye ngoku isetyenziswa njengohlobo lwemali.

feedback.0: Kanye njalo! Uchanekile (idlala yamagama iqondakele) nale mpendulo. Ubusazi ukuba inkqubo ye-Bitcoin yokuba yamkelwe ngokubanzi njengemali ifana nenkqubo igolide eyadlula kuyo ukuze ibe yindlela eyamkelweyo yemali?

feedback.2: Ndiyaxolisa ukukuxelela, kodwa i-Bitcoin isekwinkqubo yokuba yamkelwe ngokubanzi njengemali. Amathamsanqa kwixesha elizayo!

monetizationStage.question: Yintoni inqanaba langoku lokuguqulwa kwe-Bitcoin?
monetizationStage.text:
I-Bitcoin ngoku itshintsha ukusuka kwinqanaba lokuqala lokusetyenziswa njengemali ukuya kwinqanaba lesibini. Kunokuthatha iminyaka emininzi ukuze i-Bitcoin isetyenziswe njengendlela yokutshintshiselana iimpahla neenkonzo, njengezinye iimali.

Inkqubo ye-Bitcoin yokuba yamkelwe ngokubanzi njengemali ayiqinisekanga, kuba inkqubo efanayo yathatha ixesha elide kwigolide kwaye akukho mntu uphilayo obone impahla isiba yimali ngendlela efanayo naleyo iqhubeka nge-Bitcoin. Akukho mava maninzi ngale nkqubo, kodwa ukuphuhliswa kwihlabathi lonke kuthabathekisa kakhulu kwaye kuqhubeka ngokukhawuleza kwixesha ledijithali elinxibeleleneyo.
monetizationStage.title: I-Bitcoin ikwinqanaba lokuguqulelwa

Kodwa ekugqibeleni, kukuzimisela kwabantu ukukhweba nokwamkela into njengentlawulo okuchonga ixabiso layo njengemali

notFromGovernment.question: Yintoni imali?
notFromGovernment.text:
Kukho ingxelo engachanekanga edumileyo ethi imali yinto karhulumente kwaye ayinakuphila ngaphandle kukarhulumente. Oku akuyiyo inyaniso.

Imbali yemali ibuyela kumawaka eminyaka kumaxesha apho oorhulumente babengekho, kodwa imali yayikho.

Oku kubonakalisa ukuba imali iphuma ngokwayo kwaye nje yeyona mpahla itshintshiselwayo kwimarike. Ayiyiyo into karhulumente kwaye ngokuqinisekileyo ayifuni rhulumente ukuze imali isebenze.
notFromGovernment.title: Imali ayiyiyo into karhulumente

answers.0: Ukuphucula ukusebenza kweenethiwekhi ezincinci zokutshintshiselana.

primaryFunction.question: Yayiyintoni umsebenzi ophambili wemali?
primaryFunction.text:
Imali yantlandlolo yayikho kade ngaphambi kweenethiwekhi zorhwebo ezikhulu. Aba-archaeologists bafumanisa ukuba abantu bokuqala babesebenzisa izixhobo ezixabisekileyo njengeekhanda zeentolo, izinto eziqokelelwayo njengamahlahla ecowry neempahla njenge-barley njengemali yantlandlolo.

Inzuzo ephambili nomsebenzi ophambili wezi mali zantlandlolo yayikukuphucula ukusebenza kweenethiwekhi ezincinci zokutshintshiselana. Iimali zantlandlolo zaphumeza oku ngokuphelisa imfuno yokudibanisa ukuhambelana kweemfuno, izimdla, umthamo okanye isakhono. Zanciphisa kakhulu nemfuno yetyala, elona, ngaphandle kokubhala kumaxesha angaphambi kwembali, lalinzima ukulandela.
primaryFunction.title: Umsebenzi ophambili wemali

monetaryMetals.question: Yintoni eyenza iintsimbi zixabise njengohlobo lwemali?
monetaryMetals.text:
Iintsimbi zazinzima ukwenziwa, okwazenza zinqabe. Zazihlala ixesha elide kunezinye izinto njengamahlahla, ukudla okuziinkozo, neentsimbi. Oku kwazenza zixabise kwaye zilula ukuthwalwa, okanye zithwaleke.

Njengoko ubuchwepheshe baphuculwa, ngakumbi ekuveliseni iintsimbi, abantu bakwazi ukudala iindlela ezingcono, eziphuculweyo zemali.
monetaryMetals.title: Iintsimbi Zemali

answers.0: Isilinganiso sesixa esintsha seeyunithi zempahla yemali ezongezelwa kumthamo okhoyo.
answers.2: Umlinganiselo osetyenziselwa ukuthelekisa ixabiso leemali ezahlukeneyo.

feedback.0: Kuchanekile! Umlinganiselo we-Stock to Flow ungaba sisixhobo esiluncedo sokuqonda ukuzinza nokunqaba kwemali okanye impahla ethile. Umsebenzi omhle

feedback.2: Akuchanekanga! Kodwa ubuncinane ucinga ngoqoqosho lwehlabathi. Amathamsanqa kwiqashiso lakho elilandelayo.

stockToFlow.question: Yintoni umlinganiselo we-Stock to Flow?
stockToFlow.text:
Umlinganiselo we-Stock to Flow lisilinganiso sesixa esintsha semali esongezelwa kumthamo okhoyo.

Ukuyibala, wahlula isixa semali ekhoyo ngesixa esiveliswa ngonyaka.

Ukuze into ibe yindlela elungileyo yokonga ixabiso, kufanele ibe nexabiso ngakumbi xa abantu befuna ukuyisebenzisa ukonga, kodwa abantu abayenzayo kufanele bangakwazi ukongeza lukhulu lwayo, okunganciphisa ixabiso layo.
stockToFlow.title: Ukuqonda Umlinganiselo we-Stock to Flow

feedback.2: Akuchanekanga! Ubunzima bemali bunxulumene ngakumbi nokuveliswa kwayo kunesixa sayo. Amathamsanqa kwimpendulo yakho elandelayo.

hardMoney.question: Yintoni ubunzima bemali?
hardMoney.text:
Ubunzima bokuvelisa iiyunithi ezintsha zemali xa kuthelekiswa nezinye iindlela zemali kubizwa ubunzima bayo. Oku kungatshintsha ngokuhamba kwexesha njengoko ubuchwepheshe buphucula kunye nento eyayinzima ukuyivelisa inokuba lula.

KwiGhana yangaphambi kwamakoloni (e-Afrika), iintsimbi ze-aggry (ezenziwe ngegalasi) zazisetyenziswa njengemali. Ukwenza igalasi kwakubiza kakhulu kolo mmandla, okwanika iintsimbi ze-aggry umlinganiselo ophezulu we-stock-to-flow kwaye wazenza zinqabe.

Kwinkulungwane ye-16, abavavanyeli baseYurophu bafumanisa ixabiso eliphezulu elalinikelwa ezi ntsimbi ngabantu baseNtshona Afrika baqala ukuzingenisa ngobuninzi; njengoko ubuchwepheshe bokwenza igalasi baseYurophu bazenza zabiza kancinci kakhulu ukuvelisa.

Kancikanci kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo, abaseYurophu basebenzisa ezi ntsimbi eziveliswe ngokutshipa ukufumana uninzi lwemithombo exabisekileyo yase-Afrika. Umphumo ohlangeneyo wokungena kwabo e-Afrika waba kukudluliswa kobutyebi obungummandla wemithombo yendalo ukuya kubaseYurophu kunye nokuguqulwa kweentsimbi ze-aggry ukusuka kwimali enzima ukuya kwimali elula.

Njengoko uluntu lwaqhubeka luguqulwa, lwaqala ukushiya imali yezinto njengamatye neentsimbi zegalasi lwaya kwiintsimbi zemali.
hardMoney.title: Imali Enzima neNtlawulelo Elula

convergingOnGold.question: Kutheni imarike ekhululekileyo yakhetha igolide njengohlobo lwemali?
convergingOnGold.text:
Kuzo zonke iintsimbi zemali, imarike ekhululekileyo ekugqibeleni yakhetha igolide njengohlobo lwemali kuba ineempawu ezimbini ezibalulekileyo ezigcina ixabiso layo lizinzile ixesha elide nakumazwe amaninzi ehlabathi:

1) Igolide ayinakutshatyalaliswa, kwaye

2) Igolide ayinakwenziwa ngezinye izinto.
convergingOnGold.title: Ukufikelela Kwigolide

feedback.2: Ukuthwala igolide ngephepha? Linyathelo linesibindi.

originsOfPaperMoney.question: Amaphepha emali ayesetyenziselwa ntoni ngexesha lokukhuliswa kweendlela zorhwebo?
originsOfPaperMoney.text:
Igolide inokuenziwa ibe ziimali okanye izithonga zobunzima nomgangatho othile. Xa iindlela zorhwebo zandiswayo, kwaba yingozi ngakumbi ukuthwala izixa ezikhulu zegolide.

Njengecebo, amaphepha emali avela kwiibhanki ezithembekileyo anokutshintshiselana ngegolide asetyenziswa. Ngo-900 CE, abarhwebi baseTshayina baqala ukusebenzisa imali yamaphepha ukuphepha ukuthwala amawaka eemali imigama emide. Baqala ukurhweba ngerisithi zamaphepha abagcini apho ababegcine khona imali okanye iimpahla.

Ekuqaleni la maphepha emali ayebhaliswe ngomntu, kodwa kwakamsinya aba ngumyalelo obhaliweyo wokuhlawula isixa kuye nabani na owayenawo (isixhobo somthwali). La maphepha anokubonwa njengomqalo wamaphepha emali anamhlanje.
originsOfPaperMoney.title: Imvelaphi Yemali Yamaphepha Exhaswe Yigolide

fractionalReserve.question: Kutheni i-Fractional Reserve Banking yaphuhliswa?
fractionalReserve.text:
I-Fractional Reserve Banking yinkqubo apho iibhanki zivumeleke ukugcina inxenye kuphela yeedipositi ezifumanayo njengogcino, ngelixa zisebenzisa intsalela ukwenza iimboleko.

Esinye isizathu sokuba le nkqubo yaphuhliswa kukuba abantu babefuna ukuzuza imali kwigolide yabo, endaweni yokuhlawula ukuyigcina.

Babenokwenza oku ngokuvumela ibhanki okanye i-vault iboleke igolide yabo kwaye bafumane intlawulo yenzala.

Ukuba abantu abaninzi babeka igolide yabo kunabo babefuna ukuyithatha emva, ibhanki yayinokuzuza inzuzo engakumbi ngokusebenzisa igolide efanayo njengesibambiso seemboleko ezininzi, ngoko ke igcina inxenye kuphela yeemboleko njengogcino.
fractionalReserve.title: Ukusungulwa Kwe-Fractional Reserve Banking

bankRun.question: Yintoni isiphumo esinokubakho xa iibhanki zikhupha amaphepha emali angaphezulu kunedipositi abenazo?
bankRun.text:
Iibhanki ngamanye amaxesha zazikhupha amaphepha emali angaphezulu kuneedipositi abenazo, okunokubangela iingxaki kuqoqosho. Ukuba abantu baqalisa ukuthandabuza ukuhlawula kwebhanki, babenokukhawuleza ukutsala imali yabo ngaxeshanye ngaphambi kwabanye. Oku kubizwa i-bank run.

Ukuphulukana ngequbuliso needipositi ngenxa ye-bank run bekunokutyhila ukuba ibhanki yayisebenzisa ulawulo olukhulu ngokugqithiseleyo nge-Fractional Reserve Banking. Oku bekunokubangela ukunqaba kobudidi kwaye kumise inkqubo yezimali iphela.
bankRun.title: Iingxaki ze-Fractional Reserve Banking

answers.1: Ukuthengisa i-ayisikhrimu nokunika indawo yabantu yokudlala imidlalo
answers.2: Ukusebenza njengomcwangcisi wezitayile nomcebisi wempahla yobukhosi

feedback.1: Ndiyaxolisa, kodwa iibhanki eziphakathi azithengisi i-ayisikhrimu okanye zinikeze indawo yabantu yokudlala imidlalo. Zinoxanduva olubaluleke ngakumbi
feedback.2: Ndiyoyika ukuba uphazamile. Iibhanki eziphakathi azisebenzi njengabacwangcisi bezitayile okanye abacebisi bempahla yobukhosi. Zama kwakhona!

modernCentralBanking.question: Yintoni injongo yebhanki ephakathi?
modernCentralBanking.text:
Ukulwa ingxaki yee-bank runs, oorhulumente badala iibhanki zabo ezibizwa "iibhanki eziphakathi."

Ezi bhanki ziphakathi zinamandla akhethekileyo okudala imali. Zisebenza njengecebo lokugcina xa iibhanki zoshishino ziphelelwa lugcino kwaye zifuna imali eyongezelelweyo ukuhlala zivulekile.

Ngenxa yalo msebenzi, iibhanki eziphakathi zikwabizwa "ababoleki bexesha lokugqibela," okuthetha ukuba zinokudala kwaye zinikele imali xa iibhanki zoshishino zifuna ubudidi ukuhlawula ukukhutshwa kwemali.
modernCentralBanking.title: Ubhanki Lwaphakathi Lwanamhlanje

answers.0: Kwenza kwananzima koorhulumente ukuboleka imali
answers.1: Kwenza kwananzima kubantu ukonga imali ebhankini
answers.2: Kwafuna oorhulumente ukuba bagcine izilwanyana kwindawo yokugcina imali yabo

feedback.0: Ewe! Umgangatho wegolide wenza kwananzima koorhulumente ukuboleka imali kuba kwakufuneka bagcine isixa esithile segolide njengogcino ukuze bakwazi ukukhupha isixa esithile semali
feedback.1: Ndiyaxolisa, kodwa umgangatho wegolide awenzanga kwananzima kubantu ukonga imali ebhankini. Yayiyingxaki kubantu kuba awunikezanga sisiqinisekiso sokuba iidipositi zabo ebhankini ziya kukhuseleka, njengoko ixabiso lemali yabo lalixhomekeke kwisakhono sikarhulumente sokugcina ugcino lwegolide yakhe
feedback.2: Ingcamango ehlekisayo, kodwa bubuvuvu noxa kunjalo! Zama kwakhona.

goldBacked.question: Yayiyintoni ingxaki ephambili yenkqubo yomgangatho wegolide koorhulumente nabantu?
goldBacked.text:
Kwixesha elidlulileyo, abanye oorhulumente baxhumanisa ixabiso lemali yabo nesixa esithile segolide, inkqubo eyaziwa njenge"mgangatho wegolide." Oku kwakuthetha ukuba urhulumente kwakufuneka agcine isixa esithile segolide njengogcino ukuze akwazi ukukhupha isixa esithile semali.

Le nkqubo yanciphisa isakhono sikarhulumente sokuboleka imali kuba babengenakushicilela nje imali engakumbi ukuze bahlawule iindleko zokuboleka. Oorhulumente babehlala beboleka imali ukuze baxhase iimfazwe okanye ezinye iiprojekthi ezibizayo, kodwa umgangatho wegolide wenza kwananzima kubo ukwenza njalo ngaphandle kokuqala baqokelele igolide eyaneleyo ukuxhasa imali entsha ababefuna ukuyikhupha.

Umgangatho wegolide wawukwayingxaki kubantu kuba awunikezanga sisiqinisekiso sokuba iidipositi zabo ebhankini ziya kukhuseleka, njengoko ixabiso lemali yabo lalixhomekeke kwisakhono sikarhulumente sokugcina ugcino lwegolide yakhe.

brettonWoods.question: Yayiyintoni injongo ephambili yenkqubo yeBretton Woods?
brettonWoods.text:
Emva kweMfazwe Yehlabathi I neII, amazwe amaninzi ayediniwe ngokwezimali kwaye ayengenayo imali eninzi. Amazwe Amanyeneyo ayenegolide eninzi kuba athengisa izixhobo ezininzi nezinye izixhobo zempi kumazwe kwamanye ngexesha leemfazwe. Ngenxa yoko, Amazwe Amanyeneyo ayelawula malunga nesibini kwisithathu segolide yehlabathi.

Ukuze kulungiswe uqoqosho lwehlabathi, kwadalwa inkqubo entsha apho amazwe ayeya kuxhumanisa iimali zawo nexabiso ledola yaseMelika.

Idola yaseMelika, yona, yayiya kuxhunywa nexabiso legolide. Oku kwakuthetha ukuba ixabiso leemali zamazwe kwamanye laliya kusekwa kwixabiso ledola yaseMelika, eyayisekwe kwisixa segolide eyayinayo Amazwe Amanyeneyo.
brettonWoods.title: Inkqubo YeBretton Woods

globalReserve.question: Yintoni imali yogcino lwehlabathi?
globalReserve.text:
Imali yogcino lwehlabathi luhlobo lwemali olusetyenziswa ngokubanzi kurhwebo lwamazwe ngamazwe norhwebo lwezimali. Yeyona imali ekhethelweyo okanye efunwa kakhulu yokugqiba urhwebo, kuba ngokuqhelekileyo izinzile kwaye yamkelwe ngokubanzi.

Utshintsho kwimali yogcino lwehlabathi lunokuba neziphumo ezibalulekileyo kwezopolitiko, kuba lunokuchaphazela ibhalansi yamandla phakathi kwamazwe.

Imali yogcino lwehlabathi ephambili ngokuqhelekileyo ibinobomi beminyaka emininzi, kunye nedola yaseMelika esebenza njengeyona mali yogcino lwehlabathi iphambili kwinkoliso yenkulungwane yama-20.

nixonShock.question: Kwenzeka ntoni kwinkqubo yeBretton Woods ngo-1971
nixonShock.text:
Inkqubo yeBretton Woods yayiyinkqubo yezemali eyasungulwa emva kweMfazwe yesiHlanu yeHlabathi ukuze kuthethelelwe ukungaqiniseki kwezoqoqosho lwehlabathi kunye namanqanaba aphezulu etyala.

Phantsi kwale nkqubo, amazwe amaninzi abophelela iimali zawo kwixabiso ledola yaseMelika, nayo yayibopheleleyo kwixabiso legolide ngexabiso lokutshintshiselana elimisiweyo. Oku kuthetha ukuba ixabiso leemali zamanye amazwe lalibotshelelwe ngokungathanga ngqo kwixabiso legolide ngedola yaseMelika.

Ngo-1971, uMongameli waseMelika uRichard Nixon waxelela uNobhala wezeMali waseMelika ukuba ayeke ukuvumela oorhulumente bamanye amazwe ukuba batshintshele iidola zabo ngegolide, inkqubo eyaziwa ngokuba 'kukutshintsheka.'

Ukuphela okungalindelekanga kokutshintsheka kweedola ngegolide kwothusa ihlabathi kwaze kwaziwa njenge-Nixon Shock, kwaphelisa ngokusebenzayo inkqubo yeBretton Woods yamaxabiso okutshintshiselana amisiweyo. Kwaphawula ukuqala kwenkqubo entsha yezemali esekelwe kumaxabiso okutshintshiselana antantayo.
nixonShock.title: I-Nixon Shock

fiatEra.question: Lithetha ntoni igama elithi 'fiat' xa lisetyenziselwa ukuthetha ngemali
fiatEra.text:
"Fiat" ligama elivela kwisiLatini elithetha "makwenziwe." Xa lisetyenziselwa ukuthetha ngemali, lithetha ukuba urhulumente udala imali ngommiselo kuphela.

Ukusukela kwi-Nixon Shock, imali ye-fiat ayixhaswanga yigolide okanye isilivere kwaye ayinakutshintshiselwa ngokuthe ngqo ngenani elimisiweyo legolide, njengoko kwakunjalo ngaphambili.

Oku kuthetha ukuba ixabiso layo livela kwinto yokuba urhulumente uthi ixabisekile kwaye abantu bayathemba ukuba baya kukwazi ukuyisebenzisa ukuthenga izinto.

Ukongeza, oorhulumente badla ngokwenza umthetho (imali enyanzelekileyo) wokuba abarhwebi kufuneka bayamkele le mali ye-fiat kwaye luluhlobo olukuphela kwemali olunokusetyenziswa ukuhlawula irhafu.

digitalFiat.question: Yintoni i-fiat yedijithali
digitalFiat.text:
I-fiat yedijithali luhlobo lwemali ekhoyo kuphela ngobuchwephesha bedijithali, efana nasekhompyutheni okanye kwiselula. Yimifanekiselo yedijithali yemali engokoqobo, efana nephepha-mali okanye iingqekembe.

I-fiat yedijithali yaba nokuqhubeka nokuqhubeka nokusasazeka kweenethiwekhi zonxibelelwano lwedijithali, efana ne-intanethi, nokukhula kwezixhobo zabathengi efana neekhompyutha neeselula ezinokuxhuma kwezo nethiwekhi. Iiprothokoli zokuhlawula ezisekwe emgangatho, eziyiindlela ezisekiweyo zokuhlawula kwi-intanethi, nazo zadlala indima ekuveleni kwe-fiat yedijithali.

I-fiat yedijithali iya ithabathela ngokuya indawo ye-fiat engokoqobo ngenxa yeendleko eziphantsi, isantya esikhulu, namandla aphezulu okugada. Ngamanye amazwi, kubiza kancinci kwaye kukhawuleza ukusebenzisa i-fiat yedijithali kwaye kulula ukulandelela imali-msebenzi eyenziwe nge-fiat yedijithali.

plasticCredit.question: Yintoni ikhadi letyala
plasticCredit.text:
Ikhadi letyala luhlobo lwekhadi lokuhlawula oluvumela abantu ukuba baboleke imali ukuhlawula izinto. Xa abantu besebenzisa amakhadi etyala, baboleka imali kwinkampani yekhadi letyala ukuhlawula izinto ngoku, endaweni yokugcina imali ukuhlawula izinto kamva.

Oku kuye kwenza kube yinto eqhelekileyo ukuboleka ukuze uthenge, into echaphazela ukhetho lwexesha labasebenzisi. Endaweni yokulinda ukugcina imali, ukuveliswa kwamakhadi etyala kwenze kuba yinto eqhelekayo kubantu ukuboleka imali ukuthenga izinto abazifunayo ngoko nangoko.

Namhlanje, kukho malunga neebhiliyoni ezintathu zamakhadi etyala asetyenzisiswayo ehlabathini.

doubleSpendProblem.question: Yintoni eyayingumba obalulekileyo ekudalweni kwe-Bitcoin
doubleSpendProblem.text:
Kwihlabathi ledijithali, kulula ukukopa izinto, ngoko kubalulekile ukuqinisekisa ukuba iyunithi enye yedijithali yemali ayinakuchithwa ngaphezu kwexesha elinye ngumnini wayo.

Kwinkqubo yezemali enegunya eliphakathi (efana norhulumente), le ngxaki isombululeka lula ngokugcina incwadi yemali-msebenzi elawulwa ligunya eliphakathi. Nangona kunjalo, oku kudla ngokumela indawo enye yokungaphumeleli ngokwasekufumanekeni nasekuthembekeni.

Kwinkqubo engaphakathi, ingxaki yokuchitha kabini inzima kakhulu ukuyisombulula. Abantu abaninzi bazamile ukudala imali yedijithali engalawulwa ngurhulumente, kodwa bonke bebeneminqweno yabo eyahlukileyo.

USatoshi Nakamoto wayithathela ingqalelo yonke le mifundo waze waba ngowokuqala ukusombulula ingxaki yokuchitha kabini ngokuqalisa i-Bitcoin ngokudala inkqubo engaphakathi evuza ukunyaniseka kwaye ibiza kakhulu ukungathembeki.

satoshisBreakthrough.question: Yeyiphi ingxaki uSatoshi ekwafuneka ayisombulule ukudala i-Bitcoin
satoshisBreakthrough.text:
Isisombululo sikaSatoshi kwingxaki yokuchitha kabini yaba sisiqhekeko kwisayensi yekhompyutha neenkqubo ezisasazekileyo. De kwafika i-Bitcoin, abaninzi babecinga ukuba ayizukusombululeka.

Isisombululo sakhe savumela uSatoshi ukuba aphuhlise inkqubo entsha yemali ye-elektroniki eyenza okokuqala kwaba nokuqhubeka ukuba abantu bathumele imali yedijithali ngokuthe ngqo omnye komnye, ngaphandle kokufuna ibhanki okanye enye inqanaba ukunceda.

nativelyDigital.question: Yintoni umahluko ophambili phakathi kwemali ye-fiat yedijithali ne-Bitcoin
nativelyDigital.text:
Imali ye-fiat yedijithali yinguqulelo yedijithali yomveliso owayenzelwe ixesha loshishino. Ineengxaki nezithintelo ezifanayo nomveliso wokuqala. Yinkqubo evalekileyo elawulwa kakhulu kwaye yenzelwe ukulahlekelwa lixabiso ekuhambeni kwexesha.

I-Bitcoin luhlobo lwemali yedijithali eyayenzelwe ngokukodwa ixesha ledijithali. Inokuphuculwa ihlaziwe, kwaye nabani na angabona atshintsha ikhowudi esekelwe kuyo. Ixhamla kwiimbono nobuchule babo nabani na osebenza kuyo.

CBDCs.question: Yintoni injongo ephambili yeemali zedijithali zebhanki ephakathi (ii-CBDC)
CBDCs.text:
Iimali zedijithali zebhanki ephakathi (ii-CBDC) ziinguqulelo zedijithali zemali yendabuko ekhutshelwa kwaye ixhaswa yibhanki ephakathi.

Ii-CBDC azingaphakathi okanye zingenammiselo njenge-Bitcoin, kwaye endaweni yoko zenzelwe ukukhuphisana nezinye iindlela zokuhlawula zedijithali ukuze zilawule imarike.

Esinye sezizathu eziphambili zokuphuhliswa kwee-CBDC ngamandla okugada nokurhoxisa azinikelayo kumkhuphi.

Ukongeza, kwixesha lamanqanaba enzala engemihle eyenene (xa inqanaba lokuphakama kwamaxabiso liphezulu kunenzala), ukamkelwa okubanzi kwee-CBDC kudla ngokuhamba kunye nokupheliswa kwemali engokoqobo, nto leyo enokukhokelela ekuhleni kwexabiso lemali ngokoqobo.

rootProblem.question: Yintoni ingxaki yomnyevu yemali yendabuko ngokutsho kukaSatoshi Nakamoto
rootProblem.text:
Ngoko yayiyintoni intshukumo yokudala i-Bitcoin? Kwisaziso sakhe seprojekthi, uSatoshi Nakamoto wanika le nkcazo ilandelayo:

"Ingxaki yomnyevu yemali yendabuko kukuthemba okufunekayo ukuze isebenze. Ibhanki ephakathi kufuneka ithenjwe ukuba ayizukwehlisa ixabiso lemali, kodwa imbali yeemali ze-fiat izele kukwaphulwa koko kuthemba. Iibhanki kufuneka zithenjwe ukuba zigcine imali yethu zize ziyidlulisele nge-elektroniki, kodwa ziyiboleka njengemaza yee-bubbles zetyala zinawo umlinganiso omncinane wayo ongagcinwanga."
rootProblem.title: Ingxaki yoMnyevu

bitcoinCreator.question: Ngubani umdali we-bitcoin
bitcoinCreator.text:
Umdali we-bitcoin, owasebenzisa igama elingelolakhe elithi "Satoshi Nakamoto," akaziwa kwaye akukho mabango okuba ngumdali angqinisiswe. USatoshi wayebandakanyeka kuphela kwiprojekthi ixeshana elifutshane phambi kokuba anyamalale.

Iprothokoli ye-bitcoin isekelwe kwikhowudi evulelekileyo, okuthetha ukuba nabani na angayihlola. Le nkululeko yenza ibe yikhowudi ehlolwe kakhulu ekhoyo. Nangona imfihlelo yomdali wayo, i-bitcoin ngokwayo yinethiwekhi yezemali evulekileyo nengenakufihlwa enokuhlolwa isetyenziswe nabani na.
bitcoinCreator.title: Umdali we-Bitcoin uSatoshi Nakamoto

fiatRequiresTrust.question: Yintoni eyayingumba ophambili uSatoshi Nakamoto owayejolise ukuwujonga ngokudala i-bitcoin
fiatRequiresTrust.text:
Inkqubo yezemali ye-fiat emva kwe-1971 ifuna ukuthemba kuwo onke amanqanaba kuba isekelwe kwityala kwaye ingenamjikelo onqabileyo. Oku kuquka ukuthemba ekukwazini ukuhlawula amatyala kwixesha elizayo, ukuthemba kwiibhanki zorhwebo nezephakathi ukuba azizukwehlisa ixabiso lemali, nokuthemba ekukwazini kwazo ukuvumela ukufikelela nenkululeko yokusebenzisa imali kwimali-msebenzi.

Oku kuthemba kwaphulwe amaxesha amaninzi, kuquka ngexesha loNgquzulwano oluKhulu lwezezimali lwe-2008/09. Ukuze ajongane nalo mba, uSatoshi Nakamoto wajolise ekudaleni uhlobo lwedijithali lwemali olungafuni ukuthemba amaqela esithathu kwimali-msebenzi kwaye olungenakuhliswa lixabiso ligunya eliphakathi elikhuphe iiyunithi ezingakumbi.
fiatRequiresTrust.title: Iimali ze-Fiat ziFuna ukuThemba

moneyPrinting.question: Yintoni enye yeziphumo eziphambili zokushicilela imali ngokugqithiseleyo nokwandiswa kwetyala
moneyPrinting.text:
Ukushicilela imali ngokugqithiseleyo nokwandiswa kwetyala kunokubangela iingxaki ezininzi zentlalo nezoqoqosho, kuquka ii-bubbles zempahla kwizabelo nakwimarike yezindlu ezidla ngokubona ukulungiswa malunga neshumi leminyaka.

Ngelixa abo bakufutshane nomthombo wemali entsha badla ngokuxhamla kakhulu kwezi zijikelezi, abantu abangengeniso eliphantsi abangenampahla exabisekileyo nabaxhomekeke kumivuzo eqhelekileyo badla ngokuchaphazeleka kakhulu kukuphakama kwamaxabiso kunye nokukhula nokuwa koqoqosho okwenziwa yinkqubo yezemali ye-fiat.

Umzekelo owaziwa kakhulu woku luNgquzulwano oluKhulu lwezezimali olwaqala ngo-2008, olwandulelwa kuqokelelwa kokuqokelelwa okukhulu kwetyala nomngcipheko kwicandelo leebhanki zorhwebo.
moneyPrinting.title: Ukushicilela iMali nokuWandiswa kweTyala
