genesisBlock.question: Kutheni uSatoshi Nakamoto wadala i-Bitcoin
genesisBlock.text:
Kucacile kutheni uSatoshi Nakamoto wadala i-Bitcoin xa sihlola ibhloko yokuqala ye-blockchain ye-Bitcoin, ekubizwa ngokuba yiBhloko yoSukaphi.

Le bhloko yadalwa nguSatoshi xa waqalisa i-Bitcoin ngo-2009 kwaye iquka isalathiso kwiibhanki ezifumana uncedo lwezimali emva koNgquzulwano oluKhulu lwezezimali lwe-2008/09.

"The Times 03/Jan/2009 Chancellor on the brink of second bailout for banks"

Olu ngquzulwano, apho ukuthemba kwiinkqubo zezezimali zendabuko kwonakalayo kakhulu, lwaphefumlela uSatoshi ukuba adale uhlobo lwedijithali lwemali olungafuni ukuthemba amaqela esithathu kwimali-msebenzi kwaye olungenakuhliswa lixabiso ligunya eliphakathi elikhuphe iiyunithi ezingakumbi.
genesisBlock.title: IBhloko yoSukaphi

cypherpunks.question: Ngoobani ii-Cypherpunks kwaye yintoni injongo yabo
cypherpunks.text:
I-Bitcoin isiphumo samashumi eminyaka omsebenzi wophando weqela labantu abazibiza ngokuba zii-Cypherpunks. Banomdla wokusebenzisa i-cryptography ukuphakamisa ubumfihlo nokhuseleko kwihlabathi apho ukugadwa okukhulayo kwixesha ledijithali kunokukhokelela ekuphelelweni yinkululeko.

Iinkqubo zangaphambili zemali yedijithali ebizigxininisela kwiinethiwekhi ze-peer-to-peer (P2P) zazinengxaki enye okanye zombini ezi zilandelayo:

  * Zazifuna igunya eliphakathi ukulawula incwadi yobunini.
  * Iiyunithi zemali zazinokukopiwa, okukhokelela 'kwingxaki yokuchitha kabini' apho iyunithi enye inokuchithwa amaxesha amaninzi.

  USatoshi wazijonga zombini ezi ngxaki ngokudibanisa ubuchwephesha obukhoyo ekudalweni kwe-Bitcoin. Ingxaki yokuqala isombulula kuba imeko engaphakathi yenethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin ithetha ukuba akukho gunya liphakathi abasebenzisi abafanele balithembe. Ingxaki yesibini ijongwa kuba ubuchule be-cryptography obukhethekileyo obusetyenziswa kwi-Bitcoin benza kungenzeki ukukopa iiyunithi zemali.
cypherpunks.title: I-Bitcoin isiPhumo samaShumi eMinyaka oPhando

peer2Peer.question: Bubuchwephesha buphi uSatoshi awabuphumezayo ukusombulula iingxaki zokuphakathi nokuchitha kabini
peer2Peer.text:
Ukusombulula iingxaki ezikhankanywayo ngaphambili zokuphakathi nokuchitha kabini okunokwenzeka, uSatoshi wayila isisombululo esisekelwe kwinethiwekhi engaphakathi yee-nodes.

Ii-nodes ziikhompyutha eziqhagamshelana rhoqo omnye nomnye. Oku ngokwayo akutsha. I-intanethi ngokwayo ineziseko ezifanayo zee-nodes ezixhunyiweyo.

Zonke ii-nodes ze-bitcoin, nangona kunjalo, zigcina ikopi yencwadi yazo zonke imali-msebenzi kwimbali yenethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin.

Le ndlela entsha, engaphakathi yokugcina iincwadi, ekubizwa ngokuba yi-blockchain, yaqaliswa ngempumelelo okokuqala kwi-Bitcoin kwaye inomemezelo omkhulu wokumelana nokuphathwa-phathwa.
peer2Peer.title: Inethiwekhi ye-Peer-to-Peer

blockchain.question: Yintoni injongo yomsebenzi we-cryptographic hash kwi-blockchain ye-Bitcoin
blockchain.text:
I-blockchain ye-Bitcoin yidathabheyisi esasaziweyo egcina uluhlu olukhulayo rhoqo lwemali-msebenzi ye-Bitcoin ekubizwa ngokuba ngamabhloko.

Amabhloko abotshelelwe omnye komnye ngokusebenzisa ii-hash ze-cryptographic. Ibhloko nganye iqulethe i-hash ye-cryptographic yebhloko yangaphambili, kunye nesitampu sexesha nedatha yemali-msebenzi. Oku kudala umatsheni wamabhloko asonke axhunyiwe kunye, ibhloko nganye yakha phezu kwaleyo iphambi kwayo.

Umsebenzi we-cryptographic hash uqinisekisa ukuba xa ibhloko ongezwe kumatsheni, ayinakutshintshwa okanye ithathelwe indawo ngaphandle kokutshintsha nawo onke amabhloko alandelayo kumatsheni.

Oku kudala irekhodi elinokuqwalaselwa lokugqitha lwazo zonke imali-msebenzi ezenzeke kwi-blockchain, elinokusetyenziswa ukuqinisekisa ukungaguquki kwedatha egcinwe kumatsheni.
blockchain.title: Yintoni kanye kanye i-blockchain?

privateKey.question: Yintoni injongo yesitshixo sabucala kwimali-msebenzi ye-Bitcoin
privateKey.text:
Elinye ilitye lembombo le-Bitcoin yi-Public Key Cryptography esebenzisa ipheya yezitshixo - isitshixo sikawonke-wonke nesitshixo sabucala - ukutyikitya imali-msebenzi nokuqinisekisa ubunini beedilesi ze-Bitcoin.

Isitshixo sabucala lucwecwe olude lwabalinganiswa olusetyenziselwa ukugunyazisa imali-msebenzi ye-Bitcoin. Sidla ngokumelelwa njengomxube wamagama ali-12 (ngamanye amaxesha abe yi-24). Kuphela xa ekulungelelaniseni okufanelekileyo la magama akhokelela kwisitshixo sabucala esihambelanayo.

Nabani na owaziyo isitshixo sabucala sedilesi ye-bitcoin angalawula i-bitcoin kuloo dilesi. Ngoko ke kubalulekile ukuba igcinwe iyimfihlo kwaye ingaze yahlulelwano nabani na. Ngokufanelekileyo, kufuneka igcinwe ngaphandle kwe-intanethi, ukuze kungabikho nkqubo engafunekiyo enokufikelela kuyo.
privateKey.title: I-Cryptography yeSitshixo sikaWonke-wonke

Yabelana kuphela ngedilesi ze-Bitcoin nabahlawuli ukufumana iintlawulo

publicKey.question: Yintoni injongo yesitshixo sikawonke-wonke esiphambili kwi-Bitcoin
publicKey.text:
Isitshixo sikawonke-wonke esiphambili kwi-Bitcoin sisitshixo esifunyenwe nge-cryptography kwisitshixo sabucala se-Bitcoin kwaye sisetyenziselwa ukuvelisa iidilesi ze-Bitcoin abahlawuli abangathumela i-Bitcoin kuzo.

Sinokusetyenziselwa ukuvelisa inani elingenakulinganiswa leedilesi ze-Bitcoin ukusuka kwisitshixo esiphambili sikawonke-wonke esinye.

Ngelixa isitshixo sabucala sisetyenziselwa ukugunyazisa imali-msebenzi ye-Bitcoin kwaye ngoko ke kufuneka sigcinwe sibucala, iidilesi ze-Bitcoin ezifunyenwe kwisitshixo sikawonke-wonke zinokuhlanganyela nomhlawuli ukufumana iintlawulo kubo.

Izitshixo zikawonke-wonke eziphambili ziquka ucwecwe olude lwamanani namagama kwaye ziqala nge-xpub, ypub okanye zpub.

Idilesi ye-Bitcoin yokufumana iintlawulo iqala nge-1, 3 okanye bc1.
publicKey.title: Iidilesi ze-Bitcoin neSitshixo sikaWonke-wonke esiPhambili

mining.question: Yintoni injongo ephambili yokumba kwinethiwekhi ye-bitcoin
mining.text:
Xa umsebenzisi efuna ukuthumela imali-msebenzi kwinethiwekhi ye-bitcoin, kufuneka atyikitye imali-msebenzi ngesitshixo sakhe sabucala ukubonakalisa ukuba ungumnini wemali ethunyelwayo. Xa imali-msebenzi ityikityiwe, isasazwa kwinethiwekhi ye-peer-to-peer.

Ukumba yinkqubo yokongeza imali-msebenzi kwi-blockchain ye-bitcoin. Xa imali-msebenzi isasazwa kwinethiwekhi, ithathwa ngabembi, abaqinisekisa ukuba imali-msebenzi isebenza (umz., umsebenzisi unemali efunekayo kwaye isitshixo sabucala esisetyenzisiweyo ukutyikitya imali-msebenzi sihambelana nesitshixo sikawonke-wonke esihlanganiswe nemali).

Xa imali-msebenzi iqinisekisiwe, yongezwa kwibhloko yemali-msebenzi, kunye nephazili yemathematiki. Abembi bakhuphisana ukusombulula iphazili, kwaye owokuqala ukuyisombulula ufumana ukongeza ibhloko kwi-blockchain aze afumane umvuzo nge-bitcoin. Umvuzo ngoku zii-bitcoin eziyi-3.125, kunye nayo nayiphi na iirhafu zemali-msebenzi ebezibandakanywe kwibhloko.

Ukongezela ekongezeni imali-msebenzi kwi-blockchain, ukumba kunceda nokukhusela inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin. Oku kungenxa yokuba ukusombulula iphazili kufuna amandla amakhulu okukompyutha, kwaye ukongeza ibhloko kwi-blockchain kufuna abanye abembi baqinisekise isisombululo. Oku kwenza kunzima kakhulu nakumntu omnye okanye iqela ukutshintsha i-blockchain.
mining.title: Ukumba

proofOfWork.question: Inethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin idala njani umthombo wenyaniso nangona ingenagunya eliphakathi
proofOfWork.text:
Iinkqubo ezingaphakathi, ngokwenkcazo, azinawumthombo omnye wenyaniso.

Isiqhekeko sikaSatoshi yayikukwakha inkqubo evumela bonke abathathi-nxaxheba ukuba bajonge kwinyani enye ngokuzimeleyo. I-proof of work yiyo evumela oku kwenzeke. Umba we-proof of work kukudala imbali engenakuphikiswa. Ukuba iimbali ezimbini zikhuphisana, leyo inomsebenzi omninzi ofakwe kuyo iyaphumelela.

Umatsheni onomsebenzi omninzi yinyani, ngokwenkcazo. Oku kubizwa ngokuba kukuvumelana kukaNakamoto. Oku kusebenza kuba umsebenzi ufuna amandla. Kwi-Bitcoin, umsebenzi lukukompyutha. Hayi naluphi na uhlobo lokukompyutha, kodwa ukukompyutha okungenandlela imfutshane: ukuqashela.

  Ngaphandle kwegunya eliphakathi, i-proof of work iyafuneka kuba iqinisekisa ukuba akukho ndlela imfutshane yokongeza imali-msebenzi kwi-blockchain.

  Abembi kufuneka bakhuphisane ukusombulula iphazili ngokukompyutha ngenkani, okusemvelweni kunokwenzeka, kwaye ubungqina bokuba umsebenzi wenziwe buzibonakalisa kwisiphumo somsebenzi. Oku kwenza kunzima kakhulu nakumntu omnye okanye iqela ukutshintsha imbali yemali-msebenzi.
proofOfWork.title: I-Proof of Work

difficultyAdjustment.question: Inethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin iqinisekisa njani ukuba amabhloko amatsha ongezwa malunga nemizuzu eyi-10 nganye?
difficultyAdjustment.text:
Enye inxalenye ebalulekileyo yenethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin "kukuLungiswa koBunzima" - indlela yokuhlaziya ngokuzenzekelayo eqinisekisa ukuba amabhloko afunyanwa ngemijelo emisiweyo yamalunga nemizuzu eyi-10, nokuba bangaphi abembi abathatha inxaxheba.

Rhoqo ngamabhloko ayi-2016 - malunga neveki ezimbini - isoftwe ye-Bitcoin ihlola ubude bexesha ekuthathe ukumba iqela langaphambili. Ukuba amabhloko abembiwa ngokukhawuleza kakhulu, yenza iphazili ye-cryptographic inzima ngakumbi. Ukuba abecothile kakhulu, yenza iphazili ibe lula. Oku kugcina ukukhutshelwa kwe-bitcoin entsha kushedyuli enokuqashelwa.

Le ndlela ayifani nanto kwihlabathi lengokoqobo. Umzekelo, xa abembi begolide abaninzi bezingenela ukuzingela igolide, imveliso iyanda. Kwi-Bitcoin, abembi abaninzi bandisa kuphela ukukhusela kwenethiwekhi, hayi inqanaba lokukhupha. UkuLungiswa koBunzima kuko okugcina umatshini we-Bitcoin ucotha ngexesha.
difficultyAdjustment.title: UkuLungiswa koBunzima

halving.question: Kwenzeka ntoni kumvuzo webhlokowinethiwekhi ye-bitcoin yonke iminyaka emine
halving.text:
Elinye igalelo lokugqibela elibalulekileyo ukuliqonda, kukuba umvuzo webhlokowinethiwekhi ye-bitcoin wehliselwa isiqingatha yonke iminyaka emine, okanye yonke amabhloko ayi-210,000.

Esi siganeko, esaziwa ngokuba 'kukwahlula phakathi', sicwangciswe kwisoftwe ye-bitcoin ebonakalaliswa ngabo bonke abasebenzisi. Xa i-bitcoin yaqalisa okokuqala, abembi bafumana ii-bitcoin eziyi-50 ezintsha kwindawo nganye yebhloko abayongeze kwi-blockchain. Ngoku, umvuzo webhlokoziibhloko eziyi-3.125, kodwa uya kwehliswa ube ziibhloko eziyi-1.5625 ngo-2028 xa ukwahlula phakathi okulandelayo kusenzeka.

Oku kwahlula phakathi kuya kuqhubeka kusenzeka de kube ngumnyaka ka-2140, apho inani lipheleleyo lee-bitcoin eziya kube zimbiwe liya kuphelelwa kwizigidi eziyi-21. Ukusukela ngo-2023, malunga ne-92% yazo zonke ii-bitcoin (~19.3 izigidi) sele zimbiwe.

Ngokungafaniyo neemali ze-fiat, ezinokuphakamisa amaxabiso, i-bitcoin yenziwe ngokwehliswa kwamaxabiso. Oku kwenza inqabe ngaphezu kwe-fiat neentsimbi ezixabisekileyo efana negolide nesilivere, okanye nantoni na azaziwayo kwiyunivesi.
halving.title: Ukwahlula phaKathi

bitcoinDrawbacks.question: Yintoni isiphene soyilo lwe-Bitcoin
bitcoinDrawbacks.text:
I-Bitcoin, imali yedijithali esetyenziswa ngokubanzi nexabisekayo kunazo zonke ehlabathini, ivumela nabani na ukuthumela ixabiso ngaphandle komlamli othembekileyo.

Kukho, nangona kunjalo, ezinye iziphene kuyilo lwe-bitcoin elibeka phambili ukhuseleko kunye nokuphakathi kwenkotha yokwandisa.

Imali-msebenzi eqinisekiswe kwi-blockchain ye-bitcoin ithatha ixesha elifika kwiyure enye phambi kokuba inganakubuyiselwa.

Iintlawulo ezincinane kakhulu, okanye iintlawulo ezingaphantsi kweesenti ezimbalwa, ziqinisekiswa ngokungamanyiswa, kwaye iirhafu zenza imali-msebenzi enjalo ingasebenzi kwinethiwekhi namhlanje.

Ngoku, i-blockchain ye-Bitcoin inokuprosesa malunga nemali-msebenzi eyi-3 ngomzuzwana. Oku ngokubanzi kubonwa njengesithintelo se-Bitcoin ukuba ibe yimali enceda imali-msebenzi yemihla ngemihla yokuthenga yezigidi ehlabathini.
bitcoinDrawbacks.title: Iziphene ze-Bitcoin

blocksizeWars.question: Yayiyintoni impikiswano kwiiMfazwe zoBungakanani beBhloko
blocksizeWars.text:
Ezi ziphene zakhokelela kwingxoxo kumphakathi we-Bitcoin ngendlela elungileyo yokwandisa inethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin, edla ngokubizwa ngeeNkqamfazwe zoBungakanani beBhloko.

Iinkampani kwinkqubo ye-Bitcoin zaphikisa ukuba ukukhulisa ubungakanani bebhloko, okububungakanani obuphezulu bebhloko yemali-msebenzi kwi-blockchain, kunokuvumela imali-msebenzi engakumbi iproseswe ngomzuzwana, kwenza inethiwekhi isebenze ngcono kwaye ikwazi ukusingatha inqanaba elikhulu lemali-msebenzi.

Abasebenzisi be-Bitcoin kwelinye icala lengxoxo baphikisa ukuba ukukhulisa ubungakanani bebhloko kunokuphakamisela inethiwekhi, njengoko kunokufuna iikhompyutha ezibiza kakhulu nezinamandla ukuprosesa amabhloko amakhulu, kwaye kunokukhokelela ekubeni i-Bitcoin ibe semngciphekweni wokurhoxiswa.

Abasebenzisi ekugqibeleni baphumelela ekugcineni ukuphakathi nokumelana nokurhoxisa kwenethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin kwaye babonisa ukuba i-Bitcoin ilawulwa ngabasebenzisi, hayi ziinkampani. Oku kwakwathetha ukuba ukwandisa i-Bitcoin kwakuya kufuna isisombululo esohlukileyo sobunjineli endaweni yokukhulisa nje ubungakanani bebhloko.
blocksizeWars.title: IiMfazwe zoBungakanani beBhloko

lightningNetwork.question: Yenza ntoni iNethiwekhi ye-Lightning
lightningNetwork.text:
Ngelixa abasebenzisi baphumelela baze bagcina ukuphakathi kwenethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin, isisombululo sokwandisa i-Bitcoin esicetywayo ngabaphandi uTadge Dryja noJoseph Poon, esibizwa ngeNethiwekhi ye-Lightning, saqala ukufumana inkxaso saze saqaliswa ngo-2017.

INethiwekhi ye-Lightning, edla ngokubhekiselwa kuyo njenge-Lightning okanye LN, sisombululo sokwandisa esakhelwe phezu kweprothokoli ye-Bitcoin. Inceda iintlawulo ezincinane, eziphantse zibe ngoko nangoko phakathi kwabasebenzisi ngexabiso eliphantsi kakhulu kwaye iphelisa imfuno yokuba yonke imali-msebenzi yongezwe kwi-blockchain ye-Bitcoin ngelixa iqinisekisa ukuba ixabiso elithengiswayo lilandela imithetho yenethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin.
lightningNetwork.title: INethiwekhi ye-Lightning

instantPayments.question: Kuthatha ixesha elingakanani intlawulo ukuba ithathwe njengekhuselekileyo kwiNethiwekhi ye-Lightning
instantPayments.text:
Kwinethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin, imali-msebenzi ibekwa kumaqela amabhloko, kwaye amabhloko amatsha ongezwa kwi-blockchain malunga nemizuzu eyi-10 nganye. Xa intlawulo yenziwa nge-Bitcoin, ithathwa njengekhuselekileyo emva kokuba iqinisekiswe ngamabhloko amathandathu, okanye malunga neyure enye.

KwiNethiwekhi ye-Lightning, iintlawulo azifuni ukulinda ukuqinisekiswa kwamabhloko ukuze zithathwe njengekhuselekileyo. Endaweni yoko, zenzeka ngoko nangoko kwaye zigqitywa zonke ngaxeshanye ngemizuzwana embalwa.

Oku kwenza kube nokuqhubeka ukusebenzisa iNethiwekhi ye-Lightning kwimali-msebenzi yokuthenga, iintlawulo ze-peer-to-peer, okanye naniphi na elinye imeko apho ufuna ukwenza intlawulo ngoko nangoko.
instantPayments.title: Iintlawulo eziKhawulezayo

micropayments.question: Yintoni intlawulo encinane kakhulu
micropayments.text:
Iintlawulo ezincinane kakhulu zibhekisela kwimali-msebenzi yezezimali encinane kakhulu, edla ngokuba yamanani angaphantsi kwedola. Ezi ntlobo zeentlawulo zinokuba nzima ukuzenza kusetyenziswa iinkqubo zezezimali zendabuko, njengoko zidla ngokuba namanani aphantsi anokuthunyelwa neerhafu ezimisiweyo ezinokwenza iintlawulo ezincinane zingasebenzi.

INethiwekhi ye-Lightning ivumela ukwenzeka kokwenza iintlawulo ezincinane kakhulu kusetyenziswa i-Bitcoin. Ivumela abasebenzisi ukuthumela amanani ancinane kakhulu e-Bitcoin, ehla de ibe yi-1 sat, ngaphandle komngcipheko wokulahlekelwa lulawulo lwemali yabo kwiqela lesithathu (ekubizwa ngokuba 'ngumngcipheko wokuphathwa').

Ngokuchaseneyo, i-blockchain ye-Bitcoin ngoku inamanani aphantsi emali-msebenzi neerhafu ezenza iintlawulo ezincinane zingasebenzi. INethiwekhi ye-Lightning ivumela iintlawulo eziphantsi ezibizwa nge-Bitcoin, kusetyenziswa imali-msebenzi yenene ye-Bitcoin. Oku kuvula ukwenzeka kokudala iimarike ezintsha nokwenza iintlawulo ezincinane zibe yinto esebenzayo.
micropayments.title: Iintlawulo eziNcinane kakhulu

scalability.question: Kutheni ukwandisa kubalulekile kwinethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin
scalability.text:
Ukwandisa kubhekisela ekukwazini kwenkqubo, efana nenethiwekhi okanye iqonga, ukusingatha isixa esikhulu sokusetyenziswa okanye ukuhamba ngaphandle kwamava eengxaki okanye ukucotha.

Ukwandisa kubalulekile kwi-Bitcoin kuba inethiwekhi iya kufuna ukukwazi ukuxhasa isixa esiphezulu kakhulu semali-msebenzi ukuze ihlangabezane nemfuno yemali-msebenzi yokuthenga neyezenzekelayo.

INethiwekhi ye-Lightning ivumela abasebenzisi ukwenza imali-msebenzi ephantse ingenakulinganiswa omnye komnye ngaphandle kwe-blockchain ye-Bitcoin, okanye ngaphandle komatsheni.

Oku kuthetha ukuba imali-msebenzi inokwenziwa ngaphandle kwemfuno yokuba nganye irekhodwe kwi-blockchain, nto leyo enceda ukunciphisa umthwalo kwinethiwekhi ize ivumele isingatha imali-msebenzi engakumbi.

paymentChannels.question: Izitshi zentlawulo kwiNethiwekhi ye-Lightning zivumela njani abasebenzisi ukuhlawulana
paymentChannels.text:
INethiwekhi ye-Lightning ibandakanya amawaka ezitshi zentlawulo zamaqela amabini.

Unokucinga ngesitshi se-Lightning njengokuvula ithebhu kwindawo yakho yasekuhlaleni yokusela. Endaweni yokukhupha isikhwama sakho uhlawule ngaxesha ngalinye u-odola isiselo, kunengqiqo ukonga ixesha, amandla neerhafu ngokubala zonke iziselo zakho kunye ekupheleni kobusuku uze wenze ukuseta kokugqibela ngentlawulo enye.

I-Lightning isebenza ngokufanayo. Ngaxesha ngalinye xa intlawulo yenziwa ukusuka kumntu A ukuya kumntu B, i-bitcoin ityhalwa ukusuka kwicala elinye lesitshi ukuya kwelinye. Abasebenzisi ababini banohlawulana phambili nangasemva amaxesha amaninzi ngangoko bethanda, phantse ngoko nangoko kwaye nangaphantsi iirhafu.
paymentChannels.title: Isebenza njani i-Lightning?

routing.question: INethiwekhi ye-Lightning ivumela njani abasebenzisi ukuhlawulana ukuba abaxhunyiwe ngokuthe ngqo ngesitshi sentlawulo
routing.text:
Usenokucinga ukuba ukuseta isitshi sentlawulo namakhulu eebhizinisi kunokuba yinto ediniweyo, kodwa hayi. Ubuhle beNethiwekhi ye-Lightning kukuba yinethiwekhi yezitshi ezithunyelelweyo kunye.

Masithi uBob weyisela umhlobo wakhe uCarol ukuba naye ajoyine iNethiwekhi ye-Lightning. U-Alice unesitshi noBob, kwaye uBob unesitshi noCarol. U-Alice noCarol banokuhlawulana ngoku ngo-"ukurhola" ngo-Bob.

Amaqhinga e-cryptography akrelekrele kakhulu aqinisekisa ukuba uBob akanakuyiba imali ngelixa idlula kuye.

Xa wenza intlawulo kwiNethiwekhi ye-Lightning, i-node yakho ikhangela indlela yezitshi phakathi kwakho nendawo yakho yokuya. Oku kubhekiswa kuko njengokurhola. Oku konke kwenzeka ngokuzenzekelayo ziinodes ze-Lightning ezibandakanyekayo, kuvumela kwenzeke ngokunqwala kweliso.
routing.title: Ukurhola

feedback.2: Uxolo, ayichanekanga. Nangona ixabiso lokutshintshiselana le-bitcoin liye lenyuka lehla, umkhondo opheleleyo awukhange ube ngokungaqinisekiyo ngokupheleleyo. Qhubeka uzama!

itsaBubble.question: Lihambe njani ixabiso lokutshintshiselana le-bitcoin ekuhambeni kwexesha
itsaBubble.text:
Kule minyaka idlulileyo, i-bitcoin idla ngokubizwa ngebubble ngabantu abahlukeneyo. Nangona ixabiso layo liye lahla kaninzi ngokubalulekileyo okunokuba kubangele eli gama, umkhondo opheleleyo we-bitcoin uhlala usenyuka.

Abagxeki abazise ukufa kwe-bitcoin emva kwesijikelezi semarike nganye baye babonakala bephosisile, njengoko imali entsha yedijithali iqhubeke yaphumelela nangona izihlabo zabo. Njengoko aba bagxeki bephelelwa yimizekeliso yokuyisebenzisa, kucace ukuba izimangalo zabo azinasizathu.
itsaBubble.title: Ingaba i-bitcoin yi-bubble?

answers.0: Abathengi nabathengisi befikelela kwizivumelwano ngexesha lokwenyani

feedback.0: Uchanile! Umba ophambili ochaphazela ukuguquguquka kwexabiso le-bitcoin eneneni zizivumelwano ezifinyelwa ngexesha lokwenyani phakathi kwabathengi nabathengisi
feedback.1: Ndiyaxolisa, ayichanekanga ncam. Nangona ukungenelela kukarhulumente kunokuchaphazela ixabiso le-bitcoin, akuwo umba ophambili ochaphazela ukuguquguquka kwayo
feedback.2: Uxolo, ayichanekanga. Nangona isigaba senyanga sinokuba nefuthe elingaqhelekanga kwizinto ezithile, asidlali ndima ibalulekileyo ekuguquguqukeni kwexabiso lokutshintshiselana le-bitcoin. Qhubeka uzama!

itstooVolatile.question: Yintoni umba ophambili ochaphazela ukuguquguquka kwexabiso lokutshintshiselana le-bitcoin
itstooVolatile.text:
Kuyinto engekho sezingqondweni ukulindela ukuba i-bitcoin igcine ixabiso elithile, njengoko irhwetyezwa ngalo lonke ixesha, yonke imihla yonyaka, kwihlabathi liphela. Akukho mfuneko yobhaliso, iiholide zokubhanka, izivalo zesekethe, okanye uncedo lwezimali kwemarike ye-bitcoin, esebenza njengemarike enkululekileyo ngokwenyani.

Nayiphi na nayo yonke inguquguquko kwixabiso le-bitcoin yisiphumo sabathengi nabathengisi befikelela kwizivumelwano ngexesha lokwenyani ngaphandle kokungenelela koorhulumente. Njengoko i-bitcoin iqhubeka nohambo lwayo lokuba yindawo ephambili yokugcina ixabiso lehlabathi kwiXesha loLwazi, akufanelekanga ukuthathela ukuba inkqubela yayo ingaba yomgca othi tye.

Njengoko ukamkelwa kwe-bitcoin kukhula, iba nomngcipheko omncinane kunye nokwanda okuncinci okunokwenzeka, okukhokelela ekuncipheni kokuguquguquka.
itstooVolatile.title: Iguquguquka kakhulu!

answers.0: Ukuthembeka kweempawu zayo zezemali

feedback.0: Kanye ngqo! Ngokokutsho kukaParker Lewis, into ekuphela kwayo exhasa nayiphi na imali kukuthembeka kweempawu zayo zezemali
feedback.1: Ayichanekanga ncam. Nangona ukungafumaneki kunokufaka isandla kwixabiso lemali, asikuyo into ekuphela kwayo eyixhasayo. Zama kwakhona
feedback.2: Ayichanekanga. Nangona umbala ongqombela ungaba luluhlu oluhle nolwebukhosi bemali, awudlali ndima eneneni ekuxhaseni imali.

itsnotBacked.question: Yintoni into ekuphela kwayo exhasa nayiphi na imali, ngokutsho kukaParker Lewis
itsnotBacked.text:
Umbono wemali exhaswe yinto uchasene, njengoko ukuxhaswa ngokwako kuya kuthathwa njengemali. Inxalenye yexabiso lemali ivela ekungafumanekini kwayo. I-Bitcoin ayifuni ukuxhaswa yenye into enqabileyo kuba ngokwayo inqabile.

Inokuqinisekiswa nokuhlolwa ngeendlela ezizimeleyo, i-bitcoin ikhululekile kumngcipheko weqela elichaseneyo. Akukho qela lesithathu ekufuneka lithenjwe ukuba ligcine likhusele iimpahla okanye izixhobo. Ukuba kukho into, kunokwenzeka ukuba ikamva liya kuxhaswa yi-bitcoin.

Njengoko uParker Lewis watshoyo, "Ekugqibeleni, i-bitcoin ixhaswa yinto, kwaye yiyo kuphela into exhasa nayiphi na imali: ukuthembeka kweempawu zayo zezemali."
itsnotBacked.title: Ingaba imali kufuneka ixhaswe yinto?

willbecomeObsolete.question: Ingaba kunokwenzeka ukuba iBitcoin iphelelwe lixesha ngenye imini
willbecomeObsolete.text:
IBitcoin imele ukufunyanwa okungaqhelekanga kokunqaba okupheleleyo, okufana nokufunyanwa komlilo, umbane, okanye umhlaba wezibalo.

Akunangqiqo okanye akunakwenzeka ukukhuphisana neBitcoin ngokunqaba, kuba akukho nqanaba lokunqaba eliphezulu kunokunqaba okupheleleyo. Ukugxekwa kwemida ebonwayo yeBitcoin okanye iziphene kuthatha ukuba akukho kulingana kwilungiselelo lokhuseleko nomdlalo wokukhuthaza, okanye ukuba imo yangoku yeBitcoin ayiniki sele izingenelo ezibalulekileyo kwizigidi zabasebenzisi.

Njengenethiwekhi ekhula ngokukhawuleza, engathintelelwayo enexesha lokusebenza elingu-99.98% ngaphezulu kweshumi leminyaka, eqhubekise ngeetriliyoni zeedola ngexabiso kwaye ikhuselwe ngeebhiliyoni zeedola kwihardware, akunakwenzeka ukuba iBitcoin isuswe njengenethiwekhi ephambili yemali yedijithali ngeli nqanaba.

Njengoko uMichael Saylor watshoyo, "Akukho mzekelo wanaphakade wenethiwekhi yedijithali enkulu yee-$100B eyoyiswe yakuba ifikelele kweso sikhundla siphambili."
willbecomeObsolete.title: Ingaba iBitcoin iya kuphelelwa lixesha ngenye imini?

toomuchEnergy.question: IBitcoin ikuchaphazela njani ukusetyenziswa kwamandla ehlabathini
toomuchEnergy.text:
IBitcoin yimali yedijithali engahlalanga ndaweni enye efumanekayo kubasebenzisi ehlabathini jikelele kwaye inokumelana nocalu-calulo ngenxa yendlela yayo yeProof of Work.

Kuqikelelwa ukuba abantu abangamabhiliyoni amane ngoku bahlala phantsi korhulumente ozilawulayo, iBitcoin ibonelela ngendlela yabantu yokuthumela, ukufumana, ukugcina, nokuthwala ubutyebi. Kubalulekile ukuqwalasela inani lamandla elinethiwekhi yemali efana nale ekufuneka liyisebenzise kunye nokuhlola ngononophelo ukuba ngubani okufanelekileyo ukwenza izigqibo ngale nto.

Enye indlela yokucinga ngefuthe leBitcoin ekusetyenziseni amandla ehlabathini kukuzicingela imephu ye-topographic yehlabathi, kunye neendleko zombane zendawo nganye zimelwe ziincopho neemigxobhozo. Ukongeza iBitcoin kuxuba kufana nokugalela iglasi yamanzi phezu kwemephu - ihlala kwimigxobhozo, iyigudise. Oku kungenxa yokuba iBitcoin ngumthengi wamandla wehlabathi ngexabiso elimiyo, okunceda ukulinganisa ukusasazwa kokusetyenziswa kwamandla ehlabathini jikelele.
toomuchEnergy.title: Ingaba ukusetyenziswa kwamandla kweBitcoin kugqithisileyo?

answers.0: Ngokuyisebenzisa ukulawula izixhobo zasendaweni ezivelisa iihashi ukuvelisa iBitcoin

strandedEnergy.question: Amandla agqithisileyo anokusetyenziswa njani ngokumba kweBitcoin
strandedEnergy.text: Ngokungenene. Ukumba kweBitcoin kubonelela ngesisombululo esiphathekayo sokusebenzisa izinto zamandla kwimimandla apho kungekho mfuno yasekhaya okanye iindlela zothutho. Ngokusebenzisa izixhobo zasendaweni ukuvelisa iihashi, kunokwenzeka ukuvelisa iBitcoin, esinokugcinwa ukuze inyuke ixabiso okanye ithengiswe kwimarike yeBitcoin emanzi kakhulu nefikelelekayo ehlabathini jikelele.
strandedEnergy.title: Khawulinda, undixelela ukuba iBitcoin inokusetyenziselwa ukufikelela kumandla ashiywe yodwa?

answers.0: Ngokuthumela intengiselo nge-SMS

feedback.1: Kulungile, kubonakala ngathi uzama ukuhlala uqhagamshelwe kwixesha ledijithali nangexesha lokungabikho kwe-intanethi, kodwa oku akuchanekanga
feedback.2: Ndiyabona uzama ukuhlala uqhagamshelwe ngeendlela eziqhelekileyo, kodwa ngelishwa ukuthumela i-imeyili akunakuba yeyona ndlela ethembekileyo yokuthumela iintengiselo zeBitcoin ngexesha lokungabikho kwe-intanethi. Zama kwakhona!

internetDependent.question: Iintengiselo zeBitcoin zinokuthunyelwa njani xa kukho ukuphazamiseka kwe-intanethi
internetDependent.text:
Kukho umngcipheko, ewe, wokuba ukufikelela kwi-intanethi kunokulahleka ngenxa yokusilela kweziseko, iintlekele zemvelo, okanye ukuphazamiseka okwenziwa ngabom. Nangona kunjalo, kunokwenzeka ukuba kuthengiselwane ngeBitcoin kusetyenziswa iindlela ezingaphandle kwe-intanethi kunye nezinye iinethiwekhi zonxibelelwano.

Umzekelo, intengiselo yeBitcoin esayiniweyo inokuthunyelwa kwinode enye kwaye isasazwe kwinethiwekhi ukuze iqukwe kwibhloko ngabambi. Kukho iindlela ezahlukeneyo zokwenza oku, ezifana nokuthumela intengiselo nge-SMS, ukusebenzisa isipaji esingokoqobo esinomfihlo osebenzisa ixesha elinye onokuthi ubonakale xa uthintwa, okanye ukufumana iibhloko ngesathelayithi. Ezi zinto zikuvumela ukuba iBitcoin isetyenziswe naxa kukho ukuphazamiseka kwe-intanethi.
internetDependent.title: IBitcoin ixhomekeke kakhulu kwi-Intanethi

feedback.1: Ndiyabona ungumthandi weentloko zeendaba ezothusayo nokotsho izigqibo. Ngelishwa, oko akusekelwanga enyanisweni
feedback.2: Kubonakala ngathi uzama indlela elinganayo, kodwa akuchanekanga ukwenza esi sibhengezo ngaphandle kwemeko nganye. Zama kwakhona.

forcrimeOnly.question: Ingaba kuchanekile ukuthi iimpawu zeBitcoin zikhokelele ekwandeni kwemisebenzi yolwaphulo-mthetho
forcrimeOnly.text:
IBitcoin sisixhobo esingenamhlanguli sokutshintshelana ngexabiso, kwaye ayinazikholo, izimvo, okanye amaxabiso angawayo. Intsingiselo yayo ixhomekeke kwindlela eyasetyenziswa ngayo. Akuchanekanga ukuthi iimpawu zeBitcoin zikhokelele ekwandeni kwemisebenzi yolwaphulo-mthetho.

Ulwaphulo-mthetho aluphumi ekufikeleleni kwizixhobo, kodwa kwiimeko zabantu ngabanye. Ukuba iBitcoin iyaluncedo, inokusetyenziswa nguye nabani na, kubandakanya nabaphuli-mthetho. Ukuba ayiluncedo, ayinokusetyenziswa nguye nabani na, kubandakanya nabaphuli-mthetho.

Njengoko uParker Lewis watshoyo, "Akukho nto eyimfihlo ngezixhobo ezisetyenziselwa ukwenza ulwaphulo-mthetho ezenza ukuba zibe zezolwaphulo-mthetho ngokwazo. Ngaphandle kokusetyenziswa kolwaphulo-mthetho, akukho mntu ucela ukuvalwa kweendlela, i-intanethi, iposi, njl."
forcrimeOnly.title: IBitcoin yeyabaphuli-mthetho

ponziScheme.question: Yeyiphi kwezi zivakalisi ilandelayo eyinyani ngeBitcoin
ponziScheme.text:
Ukubiza iBitcoin iskimu sePonzi kubonisa ukungaqondi kweBitcoin kunye nentsingiselo yeskimu sePonzi. Iskimu sePonzi siquka izithembiso zengeniso engaphezulu kwemarike kubatyali-mali, kodwa njengenethiwekhi engavumeli mvume, iBitcoin ayinagunya eliphakathi elinokwenza ezo zithembiso.

Ukongeza, iBitcoin ayisosikimu sotyalo-mali, luhlobo lwemali. Ngokungafani namathuba otyalo-mali angacacanga anokukhuthazwa kubantu abangakathobeleli, ikhowudi yeBitcoin ivulekile kwaye ubonelelo lwayo lunokuqinisekiswa ngokuzimela ngalo lonke ixesha.
ponziScheme.title: IBitcoin yiSkimu sePonzi

bitcoinisTooSlow.question: Yintoni umahluko ophambili phakathi kokuhlawula ngekhadi letyala nokuhlawula ngeBitcoin kwi-chain
bitcoinisTooSlow.text:
Ukuhlawula ngeBitcoin akufani nokusebenzisa ikhadi letyala ukuthenga. Xa usebenzisa ikhadi letyala, intlawulo yakho idlula kumaqela amaninzi ngaphambi kokuba ifikelele kwiakhawunti yebhanki yomrhwebi emva kweentsuku okanye iiveki zokusebenza.

Ngokwahlukileyo, xa uhlawula ngeBitcoin kwi-blockchain ephambili, uthumela imali yokwenyani ngqo kumfumani ngaphandle kwabaphakathi. Oku kuthetha ukuba akukho mngcipheko wokucalulwa kwaye intengiselo ithathwa njengeyokugqibela xa iqinisekiswe ziibhloko ezintandathu kwi-blockchain.

Uthelekiso olufanelekileyo lungaba phakathi kwecandelo lesiseko seBitcoin kunye neFed njengomvelisi wemali nanjengesixhobo sokuhlanza.

Ukususela ekufikeni kweNethiwekhi yeLightning, ukugxekwa kokuthi "IBitcoin icotha kakhulu" kuthi cwaka kakhulu.
bitcoinisTooSlow.title: IBitcoin icotha kakhulu

supplyLimit.question: Ubonelelo lweBitcoin lukhuselwa njani ekuonakalisweni
supplyLimit.text:
Imvelo engahlalanga ndaweni enye yeBitcoin ivumela ubonelelo lwayo ukuba luqinisekiswe ngokuzimela yinode nganye kwinethiwekhi, luqinisekisa ukuba alunakuonakalisa. Oku kufezekiswa ngenkqubo yemvumelwano apho yonke intengiselo eqinisekiswe kwinethiwekhi yeBitcoin iqinisekiswa ngokuzimela.

Nangona nabani na enokudibanisa ikhowudi kwaye enze utshintsho kwimigaqo, akunakwenzeka ukuba olu hlobo lwekhowudi lusetyenziswe yinethiwekhi ebanzi. Inkqubo yemvumelwano engahlalanga ndaweni enye kunye nobonelelo olungenakuonakalisa beBitcoin kubaluleke kakhulu ekutsaleni kwayo njengehlobo lemali.

Ubonelelo olugqibeleleyo lweBitcoin lumiselwe kwi-21 yezigidi, kwaye naluphi na uvavanyo lokukhulisa lo mda lungafuna imvumelwano kuninzi olunzima lwenethiwekhi yeBitcoin, okungekho nakwenzeka.
supplyLimit.title: Umda woBonelelo lweBitcoin unokuonakalisa

governmentBan.question: Ingaba oorhulumente banokuyivala ngempumelelo iBitcoin
governmentBan.text:
Inokwenzeka ngobuchwepheshe ukuba oorhulumente bavale iBitcoin, kodwa ukuphunyezwa koko kuvalo kungaba nzima ngenxa yemvelo engahlalanga ndaweni enye yenethiwekhi yeBitcoin.

IBitcoin ixhomekeke kwizitshixo zabucala, ezingamanani aqhelekileyo nje, ukulawula ukufikelela kwiintengiselo ezirekhothiwe kwi-blockchain. Ezi zitshixo zabucala zinokuveliswa kwaye zigcinwe naphi na, zenza ukuba kungabikho lula ukuzibona.

Ukongeza, iziseko ezifunekayo ukufikelela kwinethiwekhi yeBitcoin zilula ngokugqithisileyo kwaye zifumaneka kakhulu, zenza kube lula kubantu ukuqinisekisa iintengiselo ngokuthembekileyo.

Njengoko uSaifedean Ammous watshoyo, "Ukuvala iBitcoin akwahluke kakhulu ekuzameni ukuvala izibalo. Kuza nje kubonakalise ukusebenza kwayo kwaye kuqhube abantu abaninzi kuyo."
governmentBan.title: Oorhulumente baya kuyivala iBitcoin

feedback.0: Sivuyisana nawe! Uvule ubuchule obugqibeleleyo besipaji seBitcoin. Ubusazi ukuba kukholiswa ukuba kulunge ngakumbi ukugcina iBitcoin kwisipaji sakho sobunini ngokukhuseleko nesithunzi

feedback.2: Owu, kubonakala ngathi ufumene impendulo engachanekanga. Ukusasazwa kweBitcoin phakathi kwabasebenzisi akulingananga. Kodwa ubheke ufunda ngeBitcoin!

concentratedOwnership.question: Ingaba kuyinyani ukuba inani elincinci lezipaji ligcina iBitcoin ininzi
concentratedOwnership.text:
Kudla ngokuthiwa inani elincinci lezipaji ligcina iBitcoin ininzi. Nangona oku kuyinyani ngobuchwepheshe, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuba ezi zipaji zidla ngokuba ngezeetshintshi ezinabathengi abazizigidi.

Abantu abaninzi bakhetha ukushiya iBitcoin yabo kwitshintshi, kodwa kukholiswa ukuba kulunge ngakumbi ukugcina iBitcoin kwisipaji sobuqu ngokukhuseleko nesithunzi.

Kubalulekile futhi ukuqaphela ukuba idilesi enye yeBitcoin inokuqulatha iBitcoin yabasebenzisi abaninzi, kwaye umsebenzisi omnye unokuphatha izipaji ezininzi. Ukukhusela isithunzi, kuthethelelwa ukuba kuveliswe idilesi entsha kwintengiselo nganye yokufumana endaweni yokusebenzisa kwakhona idilesi efanayo.
concentratedOwnership.title: Ubunini beBitcoin buxhunyaniswe kubasebenzisi abambalwa

answers.0: Hayi, ngenxa yokuba banesikhuthazi esinamandla sokulandela imigaqo yenethiwekhi nokugcina ubunyani be-blockchain
answers.1: Ewe, ngenxa yokuba banamanani amaninzi amandla e-hashing
answers.2: Ewe, kodwa kuphela ukuba basebenza ngokukuthanda kwabo

feedback.0: Ewe, kuchanekile. Ubusazi ukuba imvelo engahlalanga ndaweni enye yenethiwekhi yeBitcoin iqinisekisa ukuba akukho mbutho mnye, kubandakanya iipuli zokumba, onokuphazamisa inethiwekhi okanye acalule iintengiselo
feedback.1: Hayi, uxolo! Nangona iipuli zokumba zinamanani amaninzi amandla e-hashing, abambi ngabanye bahambiseka kakhulu kwaye banokuwalathisa lula amandla abo e-hashrate kwipuli yokumba ethembekileyo
feedback.2: Akuchanekanga. Nangona kuyinyani ukuba iipuli zokumba zinesikhuthazi sokusebenza ngokwentlalontle yazo, oku akuthethi ukuba zinokuphazamisa inethiwekhi yeBitcoin okanye zicalule iintengiselo.

centralizedMining.question: Ingaba iipuli zokumba zinokuphazamisa inethiwekhi yeBitcoin okanye zicalule iintengiselo
centralizedMining.text:
Abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuba iipuli zokumba, amaqela abambi asebenza kunye ukuze andise amathuba awo okufumana ibhloko, anokuphazamisa inethiwekhi yeBitcoin okanye acalule iintengiselo.

Nangona kunjalo, olu xhalabo luphuma ekungaqondini izikhuthazi zabambi nendima yabo kwinethiwekhi. Enyanisweni, abambi banesikhuthazi esinamandla sokulandela imigaqo yenethiwekhi nokugcina ubunyani be-blockchain, njengoko iinzuzo zabo ngokwazo zixhomekeke koko.

Njengoko uJimmy Song watshoyo, "Uninzi lwamandla e-hashing alunakho: ukuthatha iingqekembe onazo sele unazo, ukutshintsha imigaqo yeBitcoin, okanye ukukwenzakalisa ngaphandle kokuzenzakalisa."
centralizedMining.title: Ukumba kweBitcoin kuphakathi

tooExpensive.question: Ungalithelekisa njani ngokuchanekileyo ixabiso leBitcoin kunye nezinye izinto
tooExpensive.text:
Inkolo engalunganga eqhelekileyo ngeBitcoin kukuba ibiza kakhulu ukuthenga.

Nangona kunjalo, le nkolelo isekelwe kubukhulu beyunithi, njengoko kuchaneke ngakumbi ukuthelekisa ixabiso lemarike yonke leBitcoin kunye nezinye izinto endaweni yexabiso leyunithi enye yeBitcoin.

Kubalulekile futhi ukuqaphela ukuba iBitcoin enye inokwahlulwa ibe ziiyunithi ezincinci ze-100 yezigidi ezibizwa ngokuba ziisatoshi. Njengoko kuthiwa, "unokuthenga isiqwenga seBitcoin!"
tooExpensive.title: IBitcoin ibiza kakhulu

answers.2: Into yokuba iBitcoin iseyitekhnoloji entsha engekafiki kumandla ayo apheleleyo

feedback.0: Sivuyisana nawe, ubethe isipikili entloko! Ukusebenza ngokufanelekileyo nokuthembeka kwenethiwekhi yeBitcoin ngokuqinisekileyo kudlala indima ekugcineni iimali zeentengiselo zisezantsi. Ubusazi ukuba inethiwekhi yeBitcoin inokuqhuba iintengiselo eziyi-7 ngomzuzwana, oku kuyenza ibe ngokukhawuleza kuneenkqubo zeentlawulo eziqhelekileyo
feedback.1: Umzamo omhle, kodwa kubonakala ngathi uphosile inkcazelo ebalulekileyo. Zama kwakhona
feedback.2: Uxolo, kodwa ukuba yitekhnoloji entsha akuthethi ngokuzenzekelayo iimali zeentengiselo ezisezantsi. Ngamathamsanqa angcono kwixesha elizayo!

prohibitivelyHigh.question: Yintoni isizathu esiphambili sokuba iimali zeentengiselo kwicandelo eliphambili leBitcoin zihlale zisezantsi xa zithelekiswa neenkqubo zezemali eziqhelekileyo
prohibitivelyHigh.text:
Enye inkolo engalunganga ngeBitcoin kukuba iindleko zeentengiselo zayo ziphezulu kakhulu.

Nangona kunjalo, iintengiselo eziqinisekisiweyo kwicandelo eliphambili leBitcoin zibonelela ngenqanaba lokugqibela elingenakufikelela kwinkqubo yezemali eqhelekileyo. Nangona kuyinyani ukuba iimali zeentengiselo zinokonyuka ngamanye amaxesha ngenxa yomthamo omncinci webhloko nganye, inethiwekhi yeBitcoin ihlala iyicandelo lokuhlawulana elisebenza ngokufanelekileyo nelithembekileyo kwiintengiselo zexabiso eliphezulu.

Enyanisweni, ngokutsho kukaSaifedean Ammous, "phakathi kuka-Okthobha 2010 noJulayi 2021, iimali zeentengiselo zamihla le zafikelela phantse kwi-0.02% yexabiso leentengiselo."

Ukongeza, iintengiselo ezincinci, kubandakanya iintengiselo ezincinci kakhulu, zidla ngokufuduselwa kumacandelo esibini anjengeLightning, liquid, okanye iiside-chains ezidibeneyo apho iimali zisezantsi kakhulu kunezo zibonelelwa ziibhanki zabathengi.
prohibitivelyHigh.title: Iindleko zeentengiselo zeBitcoin ziphezulu kakhulu

willBeHoarded.question: Ingaba ukugcina iBitcoin kuyinto efanayo nokuqokelela iBitcoin
willBeHoarded.text:
Kukho inkolo eqhelekileyo yokuba ubonelelo olumisiweyo lweBitcoin lukhuthaza ukuqokelela, okanye isenzo sokubambelela kwiBitcoin endaweni yokuyichitha kwezoqoqosho.

Nangona kunjalo, le ngqiqo ineziphene. Okokuqala, ukonga, okanye isenzo sokubeka bucala ingeniso ukuze isetyenziswe kwikamva, kudla ngokudidaniswa nokuqokelela. Enyanisweni, ukonga yimfuneko yangemva kokutyala imali okubalulekileyo kwaye kungabonwa njengomsebenzi oxhobisayo wezemali.

Okwesibini, ukubambelela kwiBitcoin, okanye naluphi na uhlobo lwemali, yindlela eqhelekileyo yokuzikhuselela kumngcipheko wekamva kwaye akuthethi ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba ayisetyenziswa.

Njengoko uPierre Rochard wachazayo, "yonke iBitcoin ihlala igcinwe ngumntu, iintlawulo zitshintsha nje ukuba ngubani oyigcinayo." Ngamanye amazwi, isenzo sokugcina iBitcoin ngokwaso kukusetyenziswa kweBitcoin.
willBeHoarded.title: Inkolo engalunganga yokuqokelela kweBitcoin

feedback.2: Uxolo, ixabiso leBitcoin alimiselwa kuphela kukuxhaswa liqela labatyali-mali. Ngamathamsanqa angcono kwixesha elizayo!

canBeDuplicated.question: Yintoni isizathu esiphambili sokuba iBitcoin ithathwe njengexabiso nangona ikhowudi yayo inokukotywa ngumntu wonke
canBeDuplicated.text:
Enye ingxoxo ngokunxamnye nexabiso leBitcoin kukuba ayinqabanga kuba kukho amawaka ezinye ii-cryptocurrency ezifumanekayo kwaye nabani na angakopa ikhowudi kwaye enze uhlobo lwabo.

Nangona kunjalo, oku akuqwalaseli into yokuba iBitcoin ingaphezu nje kwesiqwenga sekhowudi. Yiprothokholi evulekileyo yokutshintshela ixabiso etsala abantu nemithombo ngenxa yokucaca kwayo kunye nenkqubo yophuhliso enobunono.

Njengoko u-@BTCSchellingPt waqaphelayo, "i-open source ingulawulo lwamalungu olupheleleyo. Unengqondo yomthinjana yakha izisombululo. Ufumana konke oko kuphicothwa kwaye oko kubuyela kukhuseleko. IBitcoin Core mhlawumbi yenye yeebheyisi zekhowudi eziphicothwa ngamandla ehlabathini."

Ngamanye amazwi, ixabiso leBitcoin alikho nje kwikhowudi yayo, kodwa nakwi uluntu nesiseko esiyijikelezileyo.
canBeDuplicated.title: IBitcoin ayinqabanga kuba kukho amawaka ee-cryptocurrency

feedback.2: Uphosisile! Ukuhamba kwixesha yingcamango entle yefilimu ye-sci-fi, kodwa ayinanto yakwenza nemithombo enqabileyo.

scarcity.question: Yintoni umthombo onqabileyo
scarcity.text:
Xa kungekho mithombo yaneleyo ukujikeleza, abantu namibutho bakhuphisana ngayo.

Oku kukhuphisana kudla ngokubonakaliswa kwixabiso leempahla neenkonzo kwimarike yasimahla. Ukuba imfuno yomthombo othile ikhula ngokukhawuleza kunobonelelo, inokuba yinqaba nexabiso eliphezulu.

Imali idla ngokusetyenziswa njengendlela yokuthenga izinto kuba ilula ukuthengiselana kwaye ixabisekile kuba inqabile. IBitcoin luhlobo lwemali yedijithali enobonelelo olumisiweyo, oku kuyenza ibe yinqaba nexabiso.

Ingcamango yokuba ayikho into yaneleyo ukujikeleza yimfundiso esisiseko sezoqoqosho, kodwa idla ngokungahoywa kwizigqibo zezopolitiko.
scarcity.title: Indlela imithombo emncinci esabelwa ngayo kwaye kukhuphiswanwa ngayo

feedback.0: Sivuyisana nawe! Uyazazi izinto zakho xa kufikwa kwiiprimiyamu zemali. Iprimiyamu yemali lixabiso elongezelelweyo elinokubanayo into xa isetyenziswa njengendawo yemali. Wenze kakuhle
feedback.1: Uxolo, impendulo engachanekanga! Iprimiyamu yemali ayinanto yakwenza nokuhlawula ngaphezulu kwezinto
feedback.2: Hayi! Iprimiyamu yemali ayisiso isaphulelo, yinto echasene nayo.

monetaryPremium.question: Yintoni iprimiyamu yemali
monetaryPremium.text:
Ukuba ixabiso lemali alikhange lisekelwe kukunqaba kwayo, isenokungathembeki njengendlela yokugcina ubutyebi. Kwimeko enjalo, ezinye izinto ezinqabileyo, njengezinto okanye imithombo, zinokuba nexabiso eliphezulu kwaye zisetyenziswe njengendawo yemali.

Eli xabiso elongezelelweyo laziwa njengeprimiyamu yemali. Xa uhlobo oluqhelekileyo lwemali lungasebenzi kakuhle, abantu banokuphendukela kwezinye izinto ezinqabileyo okanye ezinzima ukufumaneka njengendlela yokutshintshela ixabiso.

Ezinye iindlela zemali zeembali zazingenayo enye indlela yokusebenza okanye ixabiso ngaphandle kokuba zisetyenziswe njengendlela yokuthengiselana ngezinye izinto. Umahluko phakathi kwexabiso lento njengemali kunye nexabiso layo lokusebenziswa kwenye indlela yiprimiyamu yemali.
monetaryPremium.title: Iprimiyamu yemali

Into enomdla: UMthetho kaGresham unokusebenza nakwimali ye-"fiat", engaxhaswa yinto engumzimba njengegolide okanye isiliva

feedback.2: Ha! Yimpendulo ehlekisayo, kodwa ngelishwa ayichanekanga.

greshamsLaw.question: Yintoni uMthetho kaGresham
greshamsLaw.text:
UMthetho kaGresham yingcamango echaza indlela abantu abadla ngokusebenzisa ngayo iindidi ezahlukeneyo zemali ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo xa zisebenza kunye.

Ukuba iindidi ezimbini zemali zinikwe ixabiso elilinganayo ngurhulumente okanye elinye igunya, kodwa enye yenziwe ngento exabiseke ngakumbi, abantu baya kudla ngokonga imali exabiseke ngakumbi kwaye bachithe engaxabisekiyo.

Oku kunokwenzeka xa urhulumente ehlisa ixabiso lemali yakhe, okanye eyenza ibe nexabiso elincinci, ngokunciphisa inani lento exabisekayo equlathwe yiyo. Isiphumo kukuba abantu baphulukana nokuthemba kwimali ehlisiweyo kwaye bakhethe ukubambelela kwexabiseke ngakumbi.

Le mfundiso inokusebenza nakwimali ye-"fiat", engaxhaswa yinto engumzimba njengegolide okanye isiliva, ukuba ubonelelo lwemali lwandiswa ngendlela eyenza ibe nexabiso elincinci.

Kwiminyaka yakutshanje, ukuvela kweBitcoin njengemali yedijithali kukhokelele kwinkqubela yabantu bokonga ngeBitcoin kwaye bachithe imali yabo yesintu, okanye i-"fiat," ngokukhawuleza ngakumbi. Oku kungenxa yokuba iBitcoin ibonwa njengexabiso eliphezulu lexesha elide kwaye izinzile ngaphezu kweemali ze-fiat.
greshamsLaw.title: UMthetho kaGresham

thiersLaw.question: Yintoni uMthetho kaThier
thiersLaw.text:
UMthetho kaThier yingcamango exoxa ngokuba kwenzekani ukuba abantu namashishini bala ukwamkela okanye ukusebenzisa uhlobo lwemali olusezantsi.

Endaweni yokunyamalala ekusetyenzisweni, uhlobo lwemali olusezulu lunokurhwebelwa ngeprimiyamu, okanye ngexabiso eliphezulu kunexabiso lalo lobuso.

UMthetho kaThier ucebisa ukuba ukuba urhulumente uzama ukunyanzelisa abantu ukuba basebenzise imali esezantsi ngokuyenza ibe yimali esemthethweni, iya kungahoywa.

Ngamanye amazwi, abantu namashishini banokukhetha ukungamkeli imali esezantsi kwaye endaweni yoko bakhethe ukusebenzisa esezulu okanye ezinye iindlela zentlawulo.
thiersLaw.title: UMthetho kaThier

cantillonEffect.question: Yintoni isiPheqululo sikaCantillon
cantillonEffect.text:
IsiPheqululo sikaCantillon yinto eyenzekayo xa imali entsha ingeniswa kuqoqosho.

Xa imali entsha yongezwa, idla ngokuya kubantu okanye amashishini athile kuqala, kwaye aba bafumani bokuqala banentlahla ngaphezu kwabanye kuba bafumana ukusebenzisa imali entsha ngaphambi kokuba amaxabiso enyuke.

Oku kubangela ukuba amaxabiso eempahla neenkonzo ezithile enyuke ngaphezu kwamanye, oku kuthetha ukuba abantu abafumana imali entsha kuqala bayaxhamla ngelixa abo bayifumana kamva baphulukana.

Esi sipheqululo sachazwa okokuqala ngumgqatswa wezoqoqosho uRichard Cantillon kumxholo wemali yemveli, njengegolide nesiliva, kodwa sifaneleke ngakumbi namhlanje kwixesha lemali ye-fiat.

Xa urhulumente okanye ibhanki ezinzileyo idala imali ye-fiat entsha eninzi, inokukhokelela ekwandeni kwamaxabiso nakwi ukusasazwa okungalinganayo kobutyebi, njengoko abanye abantu namashishini benako ukufikelela kwikhredithi lula kwaye baxhamle kumaxabiso ezinto anyukayo.
cantillonEffect.title: IsiPheqululo sikaCantillon

schellingPoint.question: Yintoni iSchelling point
schellingPoint.text:
ISchelling point sisiboniso abantu abadla ngokusikhetha ngokuzenzekelayo, ngaphandle kokunxibelelana omnye nomnye.

Oku kunokwenzeka kwimidlalo yokusebenzisana yabadlali abaninzi, apho kufuneka uqikelele ukhetho lwabanye. Ukuba wenza ukhetho olungalunganga, unokujongana neziphumo okanye uphoswe yingenelo.

Unxibelelwano lusebenza ngendlela efanayo - lufana nomdlalo wokusebenzisana wabadlali abaninzi odlalwa nabanye kwinethiwekhi efanayo. Sisebenzisa iiprothokholi ezimiselweyo (njengemeyili, ulwimi oluthethwayo, okanye imali) ukunxibelelana ngempumelelo nabantu abaninzi kangangoko, ngokuphazamiseka okuncinci kangangoko. Oku kunokukhokelela ekwandeni korhwebo, ukutshintshana ngolwazi, nophuhliso.

Kwihlabathi ledijithali, abantu badla ngokukhetha ukhetho olufanayo (iSchelling point) xa betshintshela ixabiso. Oku kungenxa yokuba balindele ukuba nabanye baya kulukhetha.

Ukhetho oluyi Schelling point lolunxibelelana ngokuchanekileyo ngezibonakaliso zamaxabiso, luvumela abathathi-nxaxheba bemarike ukuba bahambisane omnye nomnye.

IBitcoin yiprothokholi yokutshintshela ixabiso eneentlahla eziliqela ngaphezu kweemali zesintu (ezibizwa "fiat"). Umzekelo, inobonelelo olumisiweyo kwaye ixabiso layo lidla ngokunyuka ngexesha, ngelixa iimali ze-fiat zidla ngokuhla ngexabiso. Ukongeza, inethiwekhi yeBitcoin ayifuni mvume, yeyehlabathi jikelele, kwaye ayinakutshatyalaliswa. Zonke ezi meko zenza iBitcoin ibe yiSchelling point yemvelo yemali.
schellingPoint.title: ISchelling Point

opportunityCost.question: Yintoni indleko zethuba
opportunityCost.text:
Indleko zethuba yingcamango yokuba xa ukhetha ukwenza into enye, awunakho ukwenza enye into endaweni yayo. Ngamanye amazwi, ngalo lonke ixesha xa usenza isigqibo sezemali, kufuneka utshintshele olunye ukhetho ngolunye.

IBitcoin inokukunceda wenze izigqibo zezemali ezingcono kwixesha elide kuba yindlela elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso (njengokonga imali). Oku kuthetha ukuba ukuba ukhetha ukutyala imali kwiBitcoin, kunokufuneka uncame ukusebenzisa loo mali kwezinye izinto okanye amathuba. Kodwa ukuba ubambelele kwiBitcoin yakho, inamandla okunyuka ngexabiso ngexesha.

Oku kubaluleke ngokukhethekileyo ngoku kuba inkqubo yezemali yesintu (ebizwa ngokuba yi-"fiat") ayiyondlela ethembekileyo yokonga imali - yenziwe ngendlela ebangela ukuba ixabiso lemali lehle ngexesha. Ngoko ke, kubalulekile ukwenza izigqibo zezemali ngobunono ukugcina ubutyebi bakho.
opportunityCost.title: Indleko Zethuba

timePreference.question: Yintoni ukukhetha kwexesha
timePreference.text:
Ukukhetha kwexesha yingcamango yokuba ubungakanani bexesha okufuneka ulinde ukuba into yenzeke bunokuchaphazela izigqibo ozenzayo.

Umzekelo, ukuba ubeka ixabiso kwangoku ngaphezu kwekamva, unokuba nesimo esingakumbi sokukhetha into ekunika ukwaneliseka ngokukhawuleza.

Ngakwicala elinye, ukuba ubeka ixabiso kwikamva ngakumbi, usenokuzimisela ukulinda ixesha elide into enenzuzo enkulu kwixesha elide.

Kukho izinto ezininzi ezinokuchaphazela ukukhetha kwakho kwexesha, ezifana nokhuseleko lwakho lobuqu, amazinga erhafu, amalungelo epropathi, nokukwazi ukugcina ixabiso ngokuthembekileyo.

"Ukuqina" kwemali (ukuba igcina kakuhle kangakanani ixabiso layo ngexesha) kubalulekile futhi kuba kunokukhuthaza abantu ukuba bonge, bacwangcise, kwaye batyale imali kwikamva. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuba ukukhetha kwexesha asiyonto emisiweyo - kungatshintsha ngokusekelwe kwizikhuthazi ekuhlaleni kwakho.
timePreference.title: Ukukhetha kweXesha

impossibleTrinity.question: Ubukho beBitcoin buyichaphazela njani iTrilemma kaMundell-Fleming?
impossibleTrinity.text:
Ubuthathu obungenakwenzeka, obaziwa njengeTrilemma kaMundell-Fleming, yingcamango echaza ukutshintshana okubandakanyekayo ekumiseleni umgaqo-nkqubo wemali yamazwe welizwe elizimeleyo.

Ithi ilizwe linokukhetha ezimbini kuphela kwezi ntathu: amazinga otshintshiselano amisiweyo, ukukhululeka kokubaleka kwemali, nomgaqo-nkqubo wemali ozimeleyo.

Ezi ntathu azinakho ukuphuthunywa ngexesha elinye. Oku kungenxa yokuba ukukhululeka kokubaleka kwemali kwelizwe, okanye ukuhamba kwemali engena nephuma kwilizwe, kunokuchatshazelwa lixabiso lemali yalo nomgaqo-nkqubo walo wemali, omisela imigaqo yobungakanani bemali ekusetyenzisweni.

Njengoko imali isiba nokubaleka ngakumbi kwaye ihamba ngokukhululekileyo phakathi kwemida, kunzima kwilizwe ukulawula nokulathisa ukukhululeka kokubaleka kwemali yalo. Ukunyuka kweBitcoin, imali yedijithali engenamida kwaye ingachaphazeleki lutshintsho lwexabiso, kunokuphikisa ngakumbi ukukwazi kwelizwe ukumisela umgaqo-nkqubo wemali.
impossibleTrinity.title: Ubuthathu obungenakwenzeka

jevonsParadox.question: Yintoni iJevons Paradox
jevonsParadox.text:
IJevons Paradox yinto eyenzekayo xa sisebenzisa umthombo ngakumbi, nangona siwusebenzisa ngokufanelekileyo ngakumbi. Oku kwenzeka ngenxa yokuba ukusebenza ngokufanelekileyo okwandileyo kudla ngokukhokelela kwiindleko ezisezantsi, oku kunokwandisa imfuno yomthombo.

Umzekelo omnye woku kukusetyenziswa kwamalahle njengomthombo wamandla. Ekupheleni kwe-1700s, abantu babecinga ukuba amadlelo amalahle ayaphela, kodwa injini yomsi kaJames Watt yenza kwanokwenzeka ukusebenzisa amalahle ngokufanelekileyo ngakumbi. Oku kwakhokelela ekwandeni kwemfuno yamalahle, nangona ayesetyenziswa ngokufanelekileyo ngakumbi. Ulwalamano phakathi kwamandla nemali lubalulekile futhi ukuqwalasela.

Abanye abantu bacebe ukusebenzisa amandla njengomlinganiselo wexabiso lemali, kodwa oku akuphumelelanga ngokwenene. IBitcoin, ngakwicala elinye, isebenzisa inkqubo ebizwa ngebungqina bomsebenzi, ekhuthaza abantu ukuba basebenzise amandla ngokufanelekileyo ukuze bazuze imivuzo.

Nangona abanye abantu begxeka ukusetyenziswa kwamandla ngale ndlela, kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuba abantu basoloko befumana iindlela ezintsha zokuvelisa amandla, kwaye akufanele sicinge ukuba amandla ngumthombo omisiweyo okanye omncinci.
jevonsParadox.title: IJevons Paradox

feedback.2: Ndiyoyika kuya kufuneka ubeke bucala iimpahla zokuhlamba kwaye unikele ingqalelo ngakumbi kwezoqoqosho. Umgaqo kaPareto ayiyondlela yokusonga iimpahla, kodwa yindlela eluncedo yokuqonda indlela utshintsho oluncinci kwinto enye olunokukhokelela kutshintsho olukhulu kwenye.

powerLaws.question: Umgaqo kaPareto, owaziwa njengoMthetho we-80/20, ngumzekelo wantoni
powerLaws.text:
Imithetho yamandla yindlela yokuqonda indlela izinto ezimbini ezinxulumene ngayo. Xa into enye itshintsha, enye into itshintsha ngendlela enxulumene notshintsho lokuqala. Imithetho yamandla inokubonakala kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo, njengolwimi, ibhayoloji, nesithuba. Utshintsho oluncinci kwinto enye ludla ngokukhokelela kutshintsho olukhulu kwenye.

Kwezoqoqosho, imithetho yamandla idla ngokuboniswa kwimizobo. Umzekelo omnye womthetho wamandla ngumgaqo kaPareto, othi malunga ne-80% yeziphumo zivela kwi-20% yezinto ezizibangela. Kwimarike, oku kunokuthi i-20% yabravelisi benza i-80% yemarike.

Imithetho yamandla inokubonwa nakwezinye iinxalenye zeBitcoin, njengobungakanani bamandla aneepuli zokumba okanye ukuba amanani angakanani ezipaji zehardware athengiswa ziinkampani ezahlukeneyo. Inokubonwa futhi kwindlela iBitcoin esasazwa ngayo phakathi kweedilesi ezahlukeneyo.
powerLaws.title: Imithetho Yamandla

winnerTakeAll.question: Yintoni isizathu esiphambili sokuba abantu badla ngokuvumelana ngokusebenzisa uhlobo olunye lwemali kwindawo ethile
winnerTakeAll.text:
Ingcamango yeziphumo zomoyisi-uthatha-konke xa kuphela mveliso okanye inkonzo enye eyona ilungileyo kwaye wonke umntu efuna ukuyisebenzisa. Oku kunokwenzeka kwiimarike apho intlahla encinci inokukhokelela ekufumaneni yonke ishishini.

Imali yinethiwekhi efana nale, apho uhlobo olunye kuphela lwemali lusetyenziswa kwindawo ethile kuba lolona luluncedo kwaye lunezona zinto ezininzi zokuthengiselana nabanye abantu. Oku kwenzeka kuba abantu bafuna ukusebenzisa imali eya kubanika ezona zinto ezininzi kwaye ibe yeyona iluncedo kwiimeko ezininzi ezahlukeneyo.

Imali yindlela elungileyo futhi yokugcina ixabiso ixesha elide. Xa kufikwa kwiinkqubo zeemali, abantu badla ngokuvumelana ngokusebenzisa uhlobo olunye lwemali kuba yeyona imanzi kakhulu, okanye ilula ukusetyenziswa, kwaye yeyona ndlela ilungileyo yokugcina ixabiso.

unitBias.question: Yintoni ubukhulu beyunithi
unitBias.text:
Ubukhulu beyunithi luhlobo lokucinga oluthatha ukuba iyunithi enye yento yinani elifanelekileyo lokusebenzisa xa uyithelekisa nezinye izinto.

Oku akuhlali kuyinyani, ngakumbi xa kufikwa kwiBitcoin. Ukuqonda indlela iBitcoin ethelekisa ngayo nezinye iindawo zokugcina ixabiso, kufuneka ujonge inani elipheleleyo leBitcoin efumanekayo kunye nexabiso layo, hayi nje ixabiso leyunithi enye. IBitcoin incinci kakhulu kwaye inokuhlulwa ibe ngamanani amancinci kakhulu, ukuya kwiindawo ezisibhozo emva kwekhoma. Oku kuthetha ukuba unokuthenga isiqwenga esincinci kakhulu seBitcoin ukuba ufuna.

Abantu ngamanye amaxesha bacinga ukuba ezinye ii-cryptocurrency zibiza kancinci kuneBitcoin kuba zibiza kancinci ngeyunithi, kodwa oku akuhlali kuyinyani. IBitcoin luhlobo olulodwa lwemali yedijithali kuba inomda wobonelelo kwaye ayinakwenziwa ngobuninzi obungaphezulu.

Oku kuyenza ibe yindlela elungileyo yokugcina ixabiso kuba ixabiso alihliki ngexesha. Xa ujonge iBitcoin ngale ndlela, ungabona ukuba yinxalenye encinci kuphela yenani elipheleleyo lobutyebi obungekho kurhulumente ehlabathini.
unitBias.title: Ubukhulu beyunithi

veblenGood.question: Yintoni into kaVeblen
veblenGood.text:
Izinto zikaVeblen zizinto abantu abafuna ngaphezulu xa ixabiso linyuka. Izinto eziqhelekileyo zizinto abantu abadla ngokufuna ngaphezulu xa benemali eninzi yokuchitha.

Izinto zikaVeblen aziqhelekanga kuba abantu bazifuna ngakumbi xa zibiza kakhulu. Ezi zidla ngokuba zizinto zobunewunewu ezinzima ukufumaneka okanye ezenziwa ngobuninzi obumncinci. Oku kwenziwa ukuze zibonakale zikhethekile okanye zinqabile.

Abanye abantu banokufuna ukuthenga iBitcoin kuba isisimboli sesimo, kodwa isizathu esiphambili sokuba abantu baya kufuna ukuyithenga kukuba kukho inani elincinci layo.

Xa abantu abaninzi befuna ukuthenga iBitcoin, ixabiso linyuka kwaye kuba lula ukuyisebenzisa. Xa kulula ukuyisebenzisa, abantu abaninzi bafuna ukuyisebenzisa. Oku kudala umjikelo apho imfuno yeBitcoin iyanda, ixabiso linyuka, kwaye kuba lula ukuyisebenzisa.
veblenGood.title: Into kaVeblen

feedback.1: Impendulo engachanekanga! Kodwa ubheke ucinga ngaphandle kwebhokisi. Mhlawumbi abantu basemajukujukwini balawula izibonakaliso zamaxabiso kwisikhephe sabo... okanye mhlawumbi hayi. Ngamathamsanqa angcono kwixesha elizayo

malinvestment.question: Yintoni unobangela ophambili wokutyala imali kakubi
malinvestment.text:
Ukutyala imali kakubi xa amaxabiso ezinto engachanekanga, oku kukhokelela ekubekeni imali kwizinto ezingavelisi kangako. Oku kwenzeka kuba kunzima ukuqikelela ikamva nokwenza ukhetho olulungileyo ngokuba kwenziweni ngemali.

Xa imarike ingasebenzi ngokuchanekileyo, kufana nokuzama ukusebenzisa ikhompasi xa ungaqinisekanga ukuba uphi. Umzekelo woku xa iinkampani zingakwazi ukuhlawula imalunga yazo kwaye kufuneke ziboleke imali engaphezulu nje ukuze zihlale ziphila. Oku kufana nokuba yinkampani ye-"zombie".

Xa urhulumente elawula ezi zigqibo, unokwenza iimpazamo kuba akananndlela ilungileyo yokuchaza ukuba yintoni utyalo-mali olulungileyo yintoni engeyiyo. Oku kunokukhokelela kwizinto njengokwakha isithuthi sangaphantsi komhlaba ngaphandle kwetreyini ezaneleyo okanye ukwakha idama ngaphandle kweentambo zombane ezaneleyo.
malinvestment.title: Ukutyala imali kakubi

asymmetricPayoff.question: Yintoni ukuhlawulwa okungalingananga kumxholo wezigqibo zotyalo-mali
asymmetricPayoff.text:
Xa sisenza izigqibo malunga nokutyala imali yethu, sizama ukuqikelela ukuba kwenzekani nokuba singazuza okanye silahlekelwe malini. Ngamanye amaxesha, inani lemali esinokuyizuza okanye silahlekelwe yiyo alilingani.

Umzekelo, ukuba sityala imali kwinto enethuba elikhulu lokusizuzisa imali eninzi, kodwa kuphela nethuba elincinci lokulahlekelwa imali encinci, sinokuthi oku "kukuhlawulwa okungalingananga." Oku kuthetha ukuba amandla okuzuza (ubungakanani esinokubuzuza) makhulu kakhulu kunamandla okulahlekelwa (ubungakanani esinokubulahlekwa).

Umzekelo omnye woku yiBitcoin. Iziphumo ezinokwenzekayo zeBitcoin zifana ne-option, oku kuthetha ukuba iphumelela okanye iyasilela. Ukuba ifumana isehlo esonakalisa kakhulu, umngcipheko wokulahlekelwa yimali uyancitshiswa.

Nangona kunjalo, amandla okuzuza makhulu kakhulu, njengoko imarike yeBitcoin efikelela kuyo inamandla okuba yindawo ephambili yokugcina ubutyebi behlabathi.

Ukungalingani ekuhlawuleni, okanye iziphumo ezinokwenzeka ezingalinganiyo, kwenzeka kuphela xa kukho ukungaqondi okungalingananga okanye inkcazelo malunga notyalo-mali. Ukuba wonke umntu ebeyiqonda ngokupheleleyo iBitcoin, ngesele isetyenziswa kakhulu njengehlobo lemali.

Okwangoku, hayi wonke umntu uqondile ngamandla eBitcoin njengokhetho lwemali olungcono, ngoko ke amandla ayo okunyuka ngexabiso axhomekeke kwimfuno yayo inyuka ngaphandle kokunyuka okufanayo kubonelelo.
asymmetricPayoff.title: Ukuhlawulwa Okungalingananga

ansoffMatrix.question: IMatriks kaAnsoff ifaneleke njani ekukhuleni nakumandla eBitcoin
ansoffMatrix.text:
IMatriks kaAnsoff sisixhobo esinceda iinkampani ukuba zicinge ngendlela ezinokukhula ngayo kwaye zenze imali engaphezulu. Izinceda ukuba ziqonde ukuba kwenziweni ngemveliso okanye inkonzo enazo, nokuba izithengiswa njani kumaqela ahlukeneyo abantu.

Kwimeko yeBitcoin, yimveliso efana nohlobo lwemali yedijithali. Inamandla okusetyenziswa ngabantu abaninzi ngeendlela ezininzi ezahlukeneyo. Abantu abasebenza kwiBitcoin, njengabantu ababhalayo ikhowudi nabanceda abanye ukuqonda indlela yokuyisebenzisa, bazama ukwandisa inani labantu abayisebenzisayo kwaye bayenze ibe lula ukuyisebenzisa.

IBitcoin inokusetyenziswa ukonga imali nokuyikhusela ekuthatweni, okanye inokusetyenziswa ukuthumela nokufumana amanani amancinci emali ngokukhawuleza, ngaphandle kokudlula kumanyathelo amaninzi. Njengoko abantu abaninzi beqalisa ukusebenzisa iBitcoin, inamandla okukhula kwaye ibe yinto ethandwayo ngakumbi.

Kunokwenzeka futhi ukuba abantu neenkampani basebenzise iBitcoin njengecandelo lezicwangciso zabo zezemali, ukunceda ukukhusela imali yabo ekulahlekeni kwexabiso. Nangona isizathu esiphambili sokuba abantu banokusebenzisa iBitcoin ngoku kukukhusela ubutyebi babo, imeko yokusetyenziswa kwentlawulo ikhule ngokukhawuleza ukususela ekuqalisweni kweNethiwekhi yeLightning kwaye ezinye iimeko zokusetyenziswa zinokuvela.
ansoffMatrix.title: IMatriks kaAnsoff

DefaultWalletScreen.info: I-Akhawunti ye-Bitcoin yakho yeyokuqokelela i-sats, apho ixabiso le-USD lihamba nemarike. I-Akhawunti ye-Idola yakho ixhaswa yi-Stablesats ‚Äî igcina i-Bitcoin ekhuselweyo ukuze ihlale izinzile ngexabiso le-USD. Usoloko ugcine i-Bitcoin, kodwa ixabiso le-idola alitshintshi.

ThemeScreen.title: Theme
ThemeScreen.info: Pick your preferred theme for using Blink, or choose to keep it synced with your system settings.

StablesatsModal.body: I-Akhawunti ye-Idola isebenzisa iteknoloji ye-Stablesats ukugcina i-Bitcoin izinzile ngexabiso le-USD. Usoloko ugcine i-Bitcoin ‚Äî hayi iidola zenene ‚Äî kodwa ixabiso le-USD aliguquguquki. Ungakwazi ukuthumela nokufumana i-Bitcoin njengoko uqhele ukwenza, kodwa ayihambelani nenkqubo yebhanki yesithethe.

SplashScreen.update: Usetyenziso lwakho luphelelwe lixesha. Uhlaziyo luyafuneka phambi kokuba i-app isetyenziswe. Oku kunokwenziwa kwi-PlayStore ye-Android kunye ne-Testflight ye-iOS

mayChallenge.title: Umceli Mngeni kaMeyi!
mayChallenge.description: Khulisa isangqa sakho sangaphakathi nge-6 ukuze ufumane ithuba lokuphumelela iipiza kwintlanganiso yakho elandelayo ye-Bitcoin.
mayChallenge.details:
Ufuna iParti ye-Bitcoin Pizza Day?

Khulisa Isangqa Sakho Sangaphakathi nge-6 ukuze ufumane ithuba lokuphumelela iipiza kwintlanganiso yakho elandelayo ye-Bitcoin. Lo mceli mngeni uphela ngoMeyi we-15.

Yabelana ngezangqa zakho kwezentlalo nge-hashtag #blinkcircles ukuze uthathe inxaxheba.

Umvuzo ngu-$150 weepiza.

juneChallenge.title: Umceli Mngeni kaJuni!
juneChallenge.description: Khulisa Isangqa Sakho Sangaphakathi nge-10 ukuze ufumane ithuba lokuphumelela ithikithi elixabisa $1000 ye-Adopting Bitcoin El Salvador
juneChallenge.details:
Phumelela ithikithi elikhethekileyo ye-Adopting Bitcoin El Salvador

Khulisa Isangqa Sakho Sangaphakathi nge-10 ukuze ufumane ithuba lokuphumelela ithikithi elikhethekileyo lexabiso elingu-$1000 ye-Adopting Bitcoin El Salvador! Ithikithi iquka ukufikelela okukhethekileyo kwinkomfa enkulu, i-mezzanine enokutya/iziselo/iisnek, isidlo sangokuhlwa sabathethi, kunye neFestivali yeFilimu.

Yabelana ngezangqa zakho kwezentlalo nge-hashtag #blinkcircles ukuze uthathe inxaxheba.

Ngesi sihlandlo, kuza kubakho abaphumeleli ababini!

FullOnboarding.title: Ubhaliso olupheleleyo
FullOnboarding.requirements:
Ukunyusela i-akhawunti yakho kuza kunyusa imida yakho kukwanike ukusebenza okongezelelweyo njengokudlulisela kwii-akhawunti zebhanki kumazwe akhethiweyo.

Kuza kufuneka unikezele ngegama lakho, i-ID ekhutshelwe ngurhulumente kunye neselfie. Siza kuqala ngegama lakho.
FullOnboarding.success: Amaxwebhu afunyenwe ngempumelelo kwaye aza kuqhutywa kungekudala. ungabuyela kweli phepha ukuze ufumane isihlaziyo malunga nemeko yobhaliso lwakho
FullOnboarding.error: Kubekho impazamo ekuthunyelweni kwamaxwebhu akho. Ungaqhagamshelana nenkxaso ukuba ingxaki iqhubeka.
